org.tc: 臺灣檢驗科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
SGS是世界領先的測試、檢驗和驗證公司，是全球公認品質和誠信的標竿。我們擁有超過97,000名員工遍佈於全球2,650多個營運分公司及實驗室，致力創造一個更美好、更安全、更互聯互通的世界。
SGS 在複雜的醫療器材市場上為整個供應鏈的客戶提供專業化服務，以幫助客戶將產品成功投入市場並快速、準確的送到用戶面前。我們為製造商和其供應商提供訓練、檢測和驗證解決方案。
因此 SGS 在臺灣已建立相關醫療器材實驗室，包含電性安規測試、電磁相容性測試、機械功能測試、生物相容性測試等，提供更方便的 ONE STOP SHOPPING 測試服務。
除此之外，SGS 臺灣更擁有一支優秀的驗證及審核團隊，可為客戶提供一次性整合審核和評估服務以滿足多個標準的要求，例如：同時作 ISO 13485、CE、CMDCAS驗證，並針對醫療器材產品、零組件配合ISO、EN、ASTM、JIS 等國際規範標準，提供您完整、專業與迅速的檢測服務。
info.en:
We are SGS – the world’s leading testing, inspection and certification company. We are recognized as the global benchmark for sustainability, quality and integrity. Our 97,000 employees operate a network of 2,650 offices and laboratories, working together to enable a better, safer and more interconnected world.
SGS provides professional services to customers throughout the supply chain in the complex medical equipment market to help customers successfully put their products on the market and deliver them to users quickly and accurately. We provide training, testing and verification solutions for manufacturers and their suppliers.
Therefore, SGS has established a related medical equipment laboratory in Taiwan, including electrical equipment safety tests, electromagnetic compatibility tests, mechanical function tests, biocompatibility evaluation, etc., to provide more convenient ONE STOP SHOPPING tests services.
In addition, SGS Taiwan has an excellent verification and audit team, which can provide customers with one-time integrated audit and evaluation services to meet the requirements of multiple standards, such as: ISO 13485, CE, CMDCAS certification at the same time, and We provide you with complete, professional and rapid tests services for medical equipment products and components in accordance with ISO, EN, ASTM, JIS and other international standards.

info.tc:
自然睡眠、原生科技、共同創造生命品質
睡眠，佔每個人生命時間的三分之一，透過充分的休息能使身體修復與自癒。聽起來很自然的睡眠行為，卻成為現代人夢寐以求的精神奢侈品，入睡或睡好變得不容易。2015年8月睡眠撲滿正式上市，全臺灣首創〝獨家SFT頻率晶片＋舒曼波原生頻率〞結合，以高科技、零接觸、零干擾的方式，協助改善人們的睡眠困擾，運用物理方式活化自身修復機制，透過導引頻率共振的機轉，導正身體原本偏差的狀態，協助人們於睡眠時延長深睡期，提升睡眠品質，進而恢復內外在的平衡。
睡眠撲滿專為現代人所設計，當人們越仰賴科技所帶來的方便，無形中3C、WiFi也深深影響使睡眠下降。睡眠撲滿是用科技的方式來處理科技所帶來的問題，讓人們在紛亂的大環境當中，也能得到自然放鬆、安穩睡眠。
info.en:
SleepBank is an exclusive sleeping chip designed for in-depth sleep, SFT(Sleep  Frequency Technology) assisting the prolongation of natural in-depth sleep and allowing the body to initiate the self-curing and repairing mechanisms. 
The current sleep products are mostly measuring sleep environment, turn over, breathing, etc., cannot solve the sleep problem. SleepBank is an innovation solution, after product launched in Taiwan, many media attention and reports.
The SleepBank does not use chemical adjustment of immediate effect. Through SFT, the body and environment are slightly adjusted with harmonic physical resonance. This will increase the in-depth sleeping time, and enhance the sleep quality, allowing you to re-experience the original environment of the Earth. Your body will lie in such cozy environment, achieving natural repair, a self-curing bridge that re-connects the land and the body.

info.tc:
ible Tech.成立於2015年，首條產品線為穿戴式負離子空氣清淨器（Airvida系列），其產品的誕生，便是希望能隨時隨地帶給人們清淨的空氣，以減少吸入危害身體的PM2.5或容易引起過敏不適的花粉與過敏原。希望科技不僅帶給人們樂趣，也帶給人們健康舒適的環境。
ible Technology 全新推出 Airvida E1，為全球首創結合穿戴式負離子空氣清淨機及藍牙耳機的創新產品，讓使用者在享受音樂的同時，也能有效提升空氣品質。Airvida E1 在材料、外觀和功能等各方面的設計，榮獲日本 Good Design 產品設計大獎，評審也給予高度的肯定，同時榮獲2022年國家生技醫療獎防疫類產品第一名。
info.en:
ible Technology is an IOT & wearable device company aiming to protect everyone from harmful airborne substances and create better life with innovative wearable air purifiers.
Airvida E1 is the first ionic wearable air purifier with noise-cancelling earphones in the world. It generates up to 30 million negative ions every 0.6 second to effectively reduce PM2.5, allergens, and viruses breathed in. Its location-based app also provides instant air pollution info wherever we are. The amount of negative ions can be elevated based on the air condition to ensure clean air in users' facial area.

info.tc:
SmartMotion近紅外深層光療設備PHA901，是利用直接提取太陽紅外線可見光(VIS)和水過濾紅外A(wIRA)的獨家Hydro-light技術，取『近紅外線』600nm~1400nm波段，去除會傷害皮膚及眼睛之紫外光，將皮膚滲透性最好的光波照射到人體體內，提高人體核心體溫(38°C-40°C)之「全波長」全身型光熱療設備，有別於一般僅有單波長之LED設備。
PHA901具有良好的皮膚滲透性，可以將大量紅外線能量注入人體，而無需擔心皮膚灼熱感和灼傷，艙內溫度僅保持約在32°C左右，相當溫和。近紅外線的功效在國際文獻已做很多闡述，可做到抗癌活性、深層排毒、消炎、提高免疫能力、促進代謝、增加膠原蛋白及減少應激蛋白的生成等。
info.en:
JianLing’s new “Near Infrared Deep Photothermal Therapy Equipment PHA901,” which uses solar visible light and infrared A to increase the user’s deep-layer body temperature to 38°C-40°C. With exclusive “Water Filter Infrared A” (wIRA) technology, which can restrict the light wavelength around 600nm to 1400nm, remove ultraviolet light harmful to skin and the eyes, and allow beneficial light power penetrates into the mitochondria of the cell.
PHA901 is capable of injecting elevated levels of near infrared waves into the body, without fear of producing heat on the skin or cause burns. Inside the capsule, the temperature is maintained at around 32°C. The many benefits of using near infrared waves is widely documented in international research, such as counteracting cancer activity, deep detox, anti-inflammatory features, improving the immune system, metabolic activity, and reducing the production of stress proteins.

org.tc: 路迦生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
免疫細胞療法 (Immunotherapy)是當今治療癌症的新趨勢，癌症免疫療法是幫助免疫系統識別癌細胞，並強化免疫反應，達到摧毀腫瘤的目的。
其中T細胞免疫療法就是強化及活化我們體內的T細胞，而記憶型T細胞具有專一及記憶的特性，作用型T細胞在攻擊完癌細胞後會消耗殆盡功成身退，而記憶型T細胞則會留在身體內，記住腫瘤特徵，等到腫瘤再次出現時即能快速殲滅。
實際的做法是抽取病人血液，經由GTP實驗室將血液中的免疫T細胞大量培養、活化、擴增數量，再回輸病人體內，讓免疫T細胞去對抗癌細胞。
info.en:
Immunotherapy is an emerging trend in current cancer treatment. It enhances our immune system’s ability to recognize cancer cells and strengthen immune response to kill tumor. 
T cell immunotherapy is an approach which enhances and activate T cells inside our body. Memory T cells are highly specific to tumors and have long life-span thus they can provide our body with long term tumor surveillance and eliminate cancer cells efficiently. In comparison, effector T cell acts on local tumor sites only and therefore has short lifespan. 
In actually clinical settings, blood is collected from the patient during the initial step. Isolation, activation and expansion of T cells is conducted in the laboratory. And finally, the T cells which are now being expanded are then infused back into the patient to fight against cancer cells.

info.tc:
加拿大柏克醫療復健系列
手術後保護、運動傷害保護、肌肉傷害保護輔助、慢性傷害保護
身心舒適的自在生活，就是一種幸福…
源自於對截肢後不適的舒緩…
1969年德裔加拿大籍弗瑞德.侃培(Frieder Kempe)先生致力於柏克研發，其原始動機乃是試圖以物理非侵入性方式給予截肢父親舒適的保護。
第一個原型成品於1978年問世，可方便應用在任何需要保護的部位。不僅嘉惠截肢患者，其他如：運動傷害保護、肌肉傷害保護輔助、手術後保護、慢性症保護等，都建議柏克來改善。多年來已贏得多項國際學會與保健團體的肯定。
柏克系列涵蓋全身：護膝、護腰、包巾、護頸、護帽、護臂、保護背心、護腿、護肘、護腕、護手套、護鼻及截肢護套等。
info.en:
Canada Farabloc Rehabilitation Series
Protection for post-operative care, sports injuries, muscle injuries, and chronic injuries.
A comfortable body and mind in life is a kind of happiness...
Are you concerned that your dear family and friends are in a state of discomfort? They frown and suffer in silence from the torment of constant discomfort. Maybe you want to take on some of the burden, help them get rid of their discomfort, but you feel powerless. With Farabloc's help, the affected limbs can be properly protected, the discomfort alleviated, and mood improved. Farabloc uses love and care in every moment that requires protection.
Originating from providing relief from the discomfort experienced after amputation...
In 1969, Frieder Kempe, a German-Canadian devoted himself to Farabloc's research and development. His original motivation was to try to provide comfort in a non-invasive way for his amputee father.
The first prototype, introduced in 1978, can be easily applied to any limb that needs protection. Benefiting not only amputatee patients, but in cases such as sports injuries, muscle injuries, post-operative care and chronic injuries; they all see improvement with Farabloc use. Over the years, it has won the recognition of many international societies and health care organizations.
The Farabloc series covers the whole body: knee covers, waist belts, blankets, neck wraps, hats, arm guards, vests, leg guard, elbow guard, wrist-palm guards, gloves, nose covers and amputation protectors etc.

info.tc:
歐立達股份有限公司創立於1997年，自2004年開始，和德國運動科學家共同研發及臺灣國立陽明大學醫工所楊世偉師生團隊，經歷 10 年改進臨床驗證成功完成富足康科技足墊，順利轉型為足部生物力學為主的產品。
富足康科技足墊獲得國內外各類獎項，包括國家發明創作獎、金質獎、連續三年經濟部標檢局市售友善輔具評選四項優勝等，並獲得全球20年發明專利，以及十餘年國內各大院校產學合作驗證與實例，包括：醫護、農業等久站久走族群、從事各類運動人員、銀髮族、退化性關節炎患者、糖尿病患者等，富足康科技足墊對於消費者的足部健康有極大的幫助。
2022年開始歐立達跨領域研發分散壓力之專業坐墊，與國內知名醫學院合作產學驗證，推出舒壓坐墊頗受消費者好評，持續創新動能。

org.tc: 國立臺北護理健康大學
org.en: National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences

info.tc:
(一)學校發展特色
本校以「培育優質健康照護與管理專業人才」為教育目標。長年深耕護理及健康照護專業，護理考照率與就業率位居全國領先地位，優秀校友遍佈全臺醫療院所擔任重要主管幹部。本校訓練學生之專業技術及課程規劃品質與歐美國家齊平，在臺灣已為典範，並輸出國際協助友好國家進行醫療照護人才培育。
(二)產學合作專利成果
本校透過外部專利資源的引進，鼓勵教師從事以產業需求為導向之創新性研發，並促進研發成果申請專利，此外，亦透過跨校跨域的專業合作，由教師帶領學生持續研發護理及健康照護領域之產品發想、創新創意或產學研發成果，以落實教學創新，提升師生智財產能。
(三)創新育成發展
本校育成中心以打造全臺第一健康照護產業創業服務平臺為目標，以健康照護、銀髮樂活、生技醫療為發展特色。提供優質培育環境與友善的創新育成服務，強化行銷策略並輔導廠商取得營運資源，提供之各項服務：顧問輔導與諮詢服務、育成辦公室與公共空間等。
info.en:
National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences (NTUNHS) is Taiwan's first institute of higher learning for nursing and health related studies. Our university is not only a pioneer in the domain of nursing and health care but also the sole institution offering a doctoral nursing program among the vocational education system in Taiwan.
NTUNHS was founded in 1954 as the Taiwan Provincial Junior College of Nursing. In August 2010, the Ministry of Education approved the school's new name, the "National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences," in recognition of the school's outstanding and continuing pedagogical achievements. NTUNHS has three colleges: the College of Nursing, the College of Health Technology, and the College of Human Development and Health. NTUNHS focuses on providing comprehensive health care education, enhancing healthcare quality, and taking care of every stage of human life cycle.
Since 2010, NTUNHS has been awarded and sponsored by Ministry of Education’s “Teaching Excellence Project” as recognition to NTUNHS’s dedication to cultivate top-quality health care professionals. Moreover, NTUNHS is awarded MOE’s “Model Technological University Project Grant”. NTUNHS is proudly ranked by Business Weekly Magazine and 104 Job Bank Corporation as Top 1 University with the highest college graduates employment rate in Taiwan.
NTUNHS has become a model for health care education through years of hard work and carefully planned expansion. Our university is a high quality academia institution that aims become a focal point for health care knowledge and a training center for Taiwan's next generation health care talents.

org.tc: 長庚醫療財團法人

info.tc:
長庚醫療財團法人創辦於1976年，先後在臺北、林口、基隆、高雄、嘉義、桃園與雲林設立了7所長庚醫院，並受政府委託經營鳳山與土城醫院，每日診治病患32,800人次以上，擁有病床數10,000床，落實「人本濟世，病人優先」是本院的經營理念。長庚具急重難症病患照護能力，長久以來持續進行醫療品質優化改善，多次榮獲SNQ國家生技醫療品質金獎的醫院，持續創新提升品質達國際醫療水準，以維護及促進病人健康是長庚非常重視及在乎的事。
本次展覽長庚醫療財團法人以「特色醫療、智慧醫院、創新研發、公益榮耀」四大主軸呈現，含括癌症診斷、精準定位與治療、照護品質、醫療創新的成果與運用等，參展主題豐富，充份展現醫療照護的軟實力，現場並提供主題互動及體驗，歡迎民眾共同參與以了解科技治療的魅力！
長庚醫療財團法人本次參展主題包括：
一、特色醫療
1. 細胞治療
2. 尖端質子治療
3. 運動醫學
4. 美容醫學
二、智慧醫院
智能面板科技應用、遠距醫療、智能藥櫃
三、創新研發
精選創新且具臨床應用性之專利成果
四、公益榮耀
醫者仁心，全方位社會關懷＊獲獎榮耀肯定
info.en:
The Chang Gung Medical Foundation was established in 1976 by the founder of the Formosa Plastics Group(FPG).The Foundation has since established seven Chang Gung Memorial Hospitals in Taipei, Linkou,Keelung, Kaohsiung, Chiayi,Taoyuan. and Yunlin. The Foundation has also been entrusted by the governmentto operate Feng-Shan Hospital and Tucheng Hospital, as well as to assist in the operation of Dali Jen-AiHospital in Taichung. With more than 32,800 patients treated daily and 10,000 beds, the hospital'smanagement philosophy is "Benefit mankind withsincerity and diligence.".
Chang Gung Hospital has the ability to care for patients with acute and critical illnesses, and has a longhistory of quality improvement. As a multiple-time SNQ National Gold Award winner, Chang Gung Hospitalis committed to maintaining and promoting the health of patients by continuing to innovate and improvequality to meet international standards.
The exhibition will be presented under the four main axes of "Specialty Medical Treatments, Smart Hospital,InnovativeR&D, and Public Welfare Glory", including cancer diagnosis, precise targeting treatment, qualityof care, and the achievements and applications of medical innovation. The exhibition will showcase the softpower of medical care with a variety of themes, and will provide interactive and hands-on experience for thepublic to learn about the charm of technological treatment.
Chang Gung Medical Foundation's exhibit topics include:
Specialty Medical Treatments
1.Cell therapy
2.Cutting-edge- Proton Therapy
3. Sports Medicine
4. Aesthetic Medicine
Smart Hospital
Smart panel technology application* Telemedicine
Innovative R&D
Selected eleven innovative, clinically applicable patent achievements and Automated dispensing cabinets
Public Welfare Glory
Award-winning recognition of comprehensive medical and social care.

info.en: We have developed ultrasound extraction equipment and natural green solvents for the extraction of plant active pharmaceutical ingredients (API). Our techniques could be applied for the extraction of API in medicinal plants depending on the different polarity of phytochemicals. Recently, the research in natural products and herbal medicine is becoming more and more important and hence the extraction instrumentation platform developed by our team can be applied in mass production process of botanical drugs.

info.tc:
1. 室內環境淨化系統：結合環境感知器、環境淨化器及AI雲平臺，有效在室內環境持續去除有害病菌、異味、甲醛、TVOC，降低密閉空間感染風險，讓機構管理者即時掌握環境品質及淨化狀態。
2. 定位求救系統: 以藍牙按鈕讓醫護人員隨身佩帶或放在口袋中，當醫護人員發現可能遭受暴力攻擊時，立刻按下隨身按鈕求救，同時把自己的位置資訊傳送到警衛室。
3. 醫療器材追蹤: 可為醫療儀器、急診設備、輪椅等醫療器材提供即時定位訊息，掌握設備及器材的位置與使用狀態，以利於人員進行調配及使用，並減輕醫護人員交班盤點負擔。
4. 嬰兒防盜: 在新生兒身上佩掛藍牙發報器，當嬰兒被異常帶離嬰兒室時系統即刻發出告警。護理系統顯示嬰兒位置，護理師及警衛可即時處理，防止嬰兒被外人擄盜
5. 安全圍籬: 病患隨身佩掛藍牙定位按鈕，當有身體不適或緊急狀況即刻按鈕求救。系統能即時顯示求救位置，讓照顧者快速趕往事發地點進行救助。並可設定安全區域，若病患離開安全區域發出告警，防止走失。
info.en:
1. Indoor Purification System – integrate Indoor Air Sensor, Indoor Air Purifier, and AI Cloud Platform to monitor indoor air quality and destroy indoor pollutants such as odors, viruses, bacteria, molds, and volatile organic compounds 24/7.
2. Indoor Positioning - When the medical staff feels threatened, he/she can press the tag to transmit an emergency alarm with in-door positioning information. The emergency message will be delivered to the security station to alert safety guards.
3. Medical Equipment Tracking - track, find, and access important medical equipment much easier with indoor positioning technology. The system updates the real-time locations of hospital assets, so the valuable equipment can be clearly located and visualized.
4. Smart baby Care - Attach a Tag to the newborn, and the system will send an alarm when the baby is abnormally taken out of the baby room. The nursing system shows the location of the baby to prevent the baby from being kidnapped by outsiders.
5. Patient Tracking - Locate patients and send alerts when they leave safe areas or press the button to call for help. The system alerts caregivers and shows the location on a map in real time, allowing the caregiver to quickly rush to the location of the accident for assistance.

org.tc: 向榮生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
向榮生技專精於幹細胞治療的研發與應用已十餘年。本公司幹細胞新藥『ELIXCYTE®』正進行第III期膝骨關節炎收案與第I/II期慢性腎臟病的臨床試驗解盲，希望為全球人口老化所伴隨之疾病，提供一個嶄新的治療契機。
在新藥研發過程中，本公司依循國際醫藥法規協和會（ICH）規範建立異體脂肪幹細胞庫，於2022年取得美國FDA主檔案(Master File, MF)備案，可作為良好的幹細胞新藥開發原料。
此外，向榮生技更擴大幹細胞科技應用，成功開發兩項專利產品：1. 幹細胞分泌物，以專利製程生產高品質、高產量及高有效成分之幹細胞分泌物，亦獲得美國FDA主檔案備案，已應用於退化性眼部疾病及其他再生醫學的應用開發，更可提供作為外泌體研究開發原料。2.細胞超低溫儲存容器『優易保® UnicoVial®』，取得衛福部第二等級醫療器材核可，獲得美國FDA主檔案備案，不僅適用於細胞產品也適用於其他生物製劑，提升製劑品質規格並彌補細胞製劑產業的缺口。
向榮生技期待以幹細胞新藥開發及幹細胞技術應用，促進幹細胞技術在全球高齡社會之再生醫學以及退化性疾病的運用，追求生命更好的生活品質。
info.en: For a decade, UnicoCell pioneered stem cell therapy R&D. UnicoCell's Gold Award-winning new stem cell product, ELIXCYTE®, has advanced to the case enrollment phase of Phase III clinical trials for knee osteoarthritis and has reached the unblinding process of Phase II clinical trials for chronic kidney disease, promising innovative treatments for aging-related diseases. The company follows ICH guidelines, holds a 2022 US FDA Master File (MF) for an adipose-derived stem cell bank, a vital raw material for stem cell drug development. UnicoCell has innovated two patented products: 1. Stem Cell Secretome, which is FDA MF-recognized, and is applied for degenerative eye diseases, regenerative medicine, and exosome research. 2. UnicoVial® ultra-low temperature storage, obtained TFDA Class II medical device approval and FDA MF-recognized, applied for cell therapy and biological product storage. UnicoCell aspires to globalize stem cell technology, promote regenerative medicine for aging-related conditions, and ultimately enhance the quality of human life.

org.tc: 國軍桃園總醫院新竹分院

info.tc: ECG心電圖是臨床檢查病患心臟疾病常用的工具之一。目前臺灣大多數醫院都使用DICOM-ECG儲存在PACS系統供醫師判讀。而QRS檢測一般通常採用的XQRS-WFDB演算法，需要較高的電腦計算成本，並且我們發現市面一些心電圖分析軟體對於心搏過速心電圖的辨識效果不會很高，故與學者共同研究改進方法。
info.en: The ECG (Electrocardiogram) is a commonly used tool in clinical examinations for diagnosing cardiovascular diseases in patients. Currently, the majority of hospitals in Taiwan store DICOM-ECG data in PACS systems for physician interpretation. The QRS detection is typically performed using the XQRS-WFDB algorithm, which demands higher computational costs. Additionally, we have observed that some ECG analysis software available in the market do not perform well in recognizing ECGs with rapid heartbeats. Therefore, we are collaborating with scholars to research and develop improved methods.

org.tc: 國防醫學院三軍總醫院澎湖分院
org.en: N.D.M.C. Tri-Service General Hospital Penghu Branch.

info.tc: 醫學中心等級之3D列印技術，引進三軍總醫院澎湖分院，特別應用於術前規劃及治療複雜性骨折手術，尤其是骨盆、髖臼或是粉碎性骨折，讓以往只能往臺灣後送的病人，能留在島上接受同等的治療。在本院放射科同仁的協助下，能以最快速的方式獲得細切的電腦斷層影像檔案，並透過內湖總院雲端軟體3D影像建模。我們再用3D列印機將術前需要的模型印出，進行手術說明及臨床規畫。此醫學中心等級的流程以成功治癒了數十位受傷的澎湖鄉親，效果著見。
info.en: The 3D printing technology of the medical center level has been introduced to the Penghu Branch of the Tri-Service General Hospital, which is specially applied to preoperative planning and treatment of complex fracture surgery, especially for pelvic, acetabular or comminuted fractures. This allows patients who previously had to be sent to Taiwan to stay on the island for the same treatment. With the assistance of the colleagues in the radiology department, we can quickly obtain finely sliced computer tomography image files and create 3D images through the cloud software of the TSGH. We then use a 3D printer to print out the necessary models for preoperative surgery instructions and clinical planning. This medical center level process has successfully healed dozens of injured Penghu residents with visible effects.

org.tc: 國防醫學院衛勤訓練中心
org.en: Health Service Training Center of National Defense Medical Center

info.tc:
1.本系統設計為開發結合國軍現行衛勤系統介面，將國軍現行紙本傷票（Medical Triage Tag）轉換為電子化手持式之手機（Cellular Phone），並運用智能眼鏡實施救護遠端醫囑賦予，可精確提升衛勤與緊急救護之救護能力，縮短傷患到院前之救護期程並可完整調度醫療量能，有效提升官兵傷患之救治率。
2.為使戰場傷患救護訓練多元化，國防醫學院委中科院研發營造戰場視覺模擬訓練系統，藉複合投影(VR)產生敵攻擊模擬效果，營造訓練者於戰場上與敵駁火之模擬訓練，及結合高階擬真假人多變化擬真傷情及生命徵象訊息回饋，藉以模擬戰場傷患負傷情況，並將其救護訓練評核系統導入AI模型架構，使訓後原因分析及精進建議，藉由機器學習產出，以有效降低人為訓練誤差，並能強化救護模擬訓練效能。
info.en:
1.This system is designed to integrate with the current military medical service system interface. It converts the paper-based medical triage tags used by the military into an electronic handheld format accessible via cellular phones. It also utilizes smart glasses for remote medical instructions, enhancing the medical and emergency response capabilities. This approach reduces the time it takes for patients to receive care before arriving at a medical facility, optimizes medical resource allocation, and effectively improves the treatment rate of injured military personnel.
2.In order to diversify TCCC training, the National Defense Medical Center has collaborated with the  National Chung-Shan Institute of Science & Technology to develop a battlefield visual simulation training system. This system employs mixed-reality (VR) technology to simulate enemy attacks, creating scenarios where trainees engage in simulated combat situations on the battlefield. By incorporating advanced lifelike humanoid simulators capable of simulating various injuries and vital signs,the system provides feedback. This approach aims to replicate battlefield injuries. Furthermore, an AI-driven evaluation framework is integrated into the training program, enabling post-training analysis and performance enhancement suggestions to be generated through machine learning. This ensures a reduction in human training errors and enhances the effectiveness of medical simulation training.

org.tc: 國軍高雄總醫院岡山分院
org.en: Kaohsiung Armed Forces General Hospital Gangshan Branch

info.tc:
1.國軍空勤人員須定期於本院航空生理訓練中心接受低壓艙航訓練，以瞭解高空缺氧對生理、心智與動作技能之影響。因訓練流程實際暴露低壓環境，存在氣壓傷害之風險，且為避免誘發減壓症之可能，須限制訓後24小時的飛行任務。
2.本院與國家中山科學研究院共同開發「新式缺氧訓練模組」，結合飛行模擬與缺氧裝置，於海平面的正常壓力環境中，提供模擬動態飛行的缺氧事件，並透過認知功能測試，強化飛行員對缺氧警覺之風險意識，同時降低人員暴露減壓環境之風險，有效提升訓練安全。
info.en:
Aircrew members are required to attend hypoxia awareness training regularly to strengthen their memory of their personal hypoxia symptoms by undergoing training inside a hypobaric chamber. But there is a risk of decompression sickness in trainees during hypobaric hypoxia training. The flight missions are forbidden in 24 hours after the training.
National Chung-Shan Institute of Science and Technology (NCSIST) and our hospital jointly developed a new hypoxia training module. It combines the flight simulator, the cognitive functions test, and can be used for hypoxia training under normal pressure. The new hypoxia training module can enhance the training safety by strengthening pilots' risk awareness of hypoxia and reducing the risk of personnel exposure to the high-altitude, low-pressure environments.

info.tc:
本院參展主題有4項
1.智慧調劑臺應用：藥品更換時，無須重新換標籤，只需透過電腦更新藥檔資料即可同步更新標籤訊息，亦可依需求隨時於藥盒呈現藥品相關資訊。調劑時刷領藥清單QR CODE，可於欲調劑藥品儲位閃燈提示，避免調劑錯誤。可提升藥師的調劑效率和準確性，保障患者的用藥安全。
2.AI藥品圖像辨識系統：藥局調劑階段與給藥階段中，藉由比對AI辨識所拍攝之藥袋內藥品與讀取藥袋處方條碼資訊之機制，輔助藥事人員核對藥袋內藥品名稱、劑量、數量等是否與藥袋處方一致。可有效降低人工檢查的錯誤率，提高調劑核對效率，改善醫院給藥過程於末端環節可能造成危及病患健康之風險。
3.院部決策AI動態即時戰情：即時呈現本院各項醫療指標及收入，使院部主官可即時掌握業績成長及指標達成率等，使其可即時管制及分配資源。
4.護理資源決策系統：即時呈現本院護理各項護理資源分配，使護理部可即時掌握護理資源及指標達成率等，使其可即時管制及分配資源。

info.tc:
雙殺菌空氣清淨機 ，運用PM2.5過濾技術，解決的過敏原問題，並搭配市場上少見的紫外光&臭氧雙重殺菌，臭氧為強氧化劑，且為氣態不受空間限制，深入HEPA濾網以及清淨機內部每個角落，臭氧能夠對病菌、病毒造成傷害並使之失去活性，但同時也會對人體有害。
臺禹科機與國內知名學術單位共同技術研發下，研發出能夠將臭氧轉換為氧氣的化學濾材，這項技術突破了使用臭氧殺菌後的殘留疑慮，使臺禹科機空氣清淨機能夠使用殺菌能量極高的紫外光&臭氧，更能消除殘留臭氧可能造成的傷害，同時解決二次污染疑慮
info.en: The IPI dual sterilization air purifier uses PM2.5 filtration technology to solve the problem of allergens, and matches with the market's rarely seen UVC & ozone dual sterilization technology to sterilize every corner of the HEPA filter and inside the air purifier. IPI chemical filters can transform ozone into oxygen. So the IPI air purifier can use the extremely high level of UVC and ozone to sterilize, eliminate the possible damages caused by ozone too, and solve the doubt of secondary pollution.

Prevention is better than cure.

This is the first immune health food in the market based on small spore Lingzhi protein technology, combined with functional excipients for blood sugar control, gastrointestinal health, and lipid control to create a new generation product.
This product is developed by Dr. Hsu Jui-Hsiang, who has been deeply involved in small spore Lingzhi protein research for forty years in Taiwan. info.tc:
硒元素在1972年被世界衛生組織(WHO)規定是人體必需的微量元素，是由於硒的超強排毒、解毒能力及高抗氧化特性。2003.09.01美國FDA規定含硒的食品可標示抗癌，大陸在2005.01.18大陸人民大會要全民補硒。硒元素功能有六大稱號如下：1.長壽元素2.抗癌之王3.心血管的保護神4.天然胰島素5.生命的火種6.天然的解毒劑。
    硒元素是存在於土壤內的微量元素，為天然無機硒。無機硒為人體無法直接吸收利用，須轉化成有機硒，人體才可吸收利用，因天然無機硒非常稀少，故市面上的硒絕大部分為用化學合成硒經酵母轉化成的酵母硒，用於醫療或人體補充用，但其毒性仍高、人體吸收利用率低，所以醫學建議每日不能超過400微克。幸運花富硒777為採用天然無機硒經過植物轉化而成的植物有機硒，其植物有機硒是功能最強、毒性最低的有機硒，經實驗得知人體吸收利用率達98%以上，為市面上最安全的硒。

info.tc:
我們相信，人與天地是相互呼應，人類為大自然的一部分，治療病痛不能違背自然律治，用天然安定心靈、放鬆身心，讓身體每一吋都因自然而呼吸。
傳統智慧，天地合一
利用中國易經、德國芳療訓練、中醫經絡、五行應用的多項傳統智慧，結合珍貴的千年檜木、牛樟，再遵循古法製作，以灶窯蒸餾、嚴格控管溫度，萃取出最完整的活性物質。繁瑣的提煉過程，是為了尋求稀有的天然植物純露與精油，讓自然與人合一。
創辦者結合易經、德國芳療訓練、中醫經絡、五行應用，與全世界最珍貴的千年檜木、牛樟、肖楠、山胡椒、香樟、柳杉等臺灣森林寶藏，研發樹王系列產品，並委託TAF認證實驗室做完整之DNA指紋圖譜、全成分解析，獲經濟部智慧財產局發明專利。曾榮獲「國家品質保證金像獎」「國際發明專利技術金牌獎」「臺灣第一品牌獎」殊榮。
info.en:
We believe that humans interact with the environment. Mankind is a part of nature; the
treatment of diseases must not conflict with nature’s system. Use nature to help soothe our
soul, relax our body and mind, allowing every inch of our body to breathe naturally.
Ancient wisdom. Integrate the environment.
Applying ancient wisdom including the I-Ching from China, aromatherapy from Germany, meridians from Chinese
medicine, and the five elements to process precious millennial cypress and Cinnamomum kanehirae. The ancient
method using kiln distillation with strict temperature control is implemented to ensure full extraction of all active
substances. The complicated extraction process obtains the rare natural plant hydrosol and essential oil, allowing
the integration of human and the nature.

info.tc: 我公司產品全部屬於超級食物營養素/Nutraceutical，主要產品有：1）硒鍺米 ，2)稻中寳（硒鍺米糠），3）硒鍺茶，4）硒鍺海水螺旋藻。以上都是目前世界獨一的功能性食物。硒元素和鍺元素都是人體的必需營養素，硒元素是冬蟲夏草的主要成分，人體缺乏硒元素會有癌症，心臟病，各種心血管疾病，肝病，糖尿病，白内障等40多種的疾病；鍺元素是人參的主要成分，鍺是吃的氧，攝取鍺元素可以增加身體内的氧氣。缺氧是萬病之源；但是臺灣的土壤缺乏硒元素和鍺元素，冬蟲夏草與人參又吃不起，怎麽辦？因此每天吃1）硒鍺米 ，2)稻中寳（硒鍺米糠），3）硒鍺茶，4）硒鍺海水螺旋藻，由日常飲食攝取硒元素和鍺元素，是養生好方法。
info.en:
All of our company's products are classified as nutraceuticals, and our main products include:
1.	SeGe Rice (selenium & germanium rich rice);
2.	Treasure Bran (SeGe-rich bran);
3.	SeGe High Mountain Tea (selenium & germanium rich high mountain tea), and
4.	SeGe Spirulina (selenium & germanium rich spirulina).
All of these are currently the world's only functional foods with such properties.
Both selenium and germanium are essential nutrients for the human body. Selenium is the main component of Cordyceps sinensis, and the human body's lack of selenium can lead to over 40 types of diseases, including cancer, heart disease, various cardiovascular diseases, liver disease, diabetes, and cataracts. Germanium is the main component of ginseng, and it is like "oxygen" for the body. By consuming germanium, the body can increase its oxygen levels, as oxygen deficiency is the source of many diseases.
However, Taiwan's soil is deficient in selenium and germanium, and Cordyceps sinensis and ginseng are expensive and not affordable for everyone. Therefore, eating 1) SeGe rice, 2) Treasure Bran (SeGe-rich bran), 3) SeGe High Mountain Tea, and 4) SeGe Spirulina daily is a great way to obtain selenium and germanium from our daily diet and promote health.

回顧過去，走進廚房已不再是傳統家庭主婦的專利，跳脫傳統觀念下，現代新男人，時尚新嫁娘，炙手可熱的單身貴族也開始向健康美食探索，選擇廚房裡的最佳角色，儼然是不分性別與年齡了，在產品的選擇上也突顯瑞康屋對品牌的信念－「高品質」，為健康生活把關，節省能源為地球略盡棉薄之力，呼之欲出的健康生活，以讓幸福回鍋為使命。
info.en:
Raken was born in the spring of 2008. The management team has many years of experience in household fine products and department store retail channels, and is committed to combining high-quality life with commodity services.
Looking back on the past, walking into the kitchen is no longer the patent of traditional housewives. Breaking away from traditional concepts, modern new men, fashionable brides, and hot single nobles have also begun to explore healthy food and choose the best role in the kitchen. It seems that there is no distinction between gender and age, and the selection of products also highlights Ruikangwu's belief in the brand - "high quality", checks for a healthy life, saves energy and contributes to the earth, a healthy life that is ready to come out, With the mission of bringing happiness back to the pot.

info.tc:
家中的隱形敵人-室內空氣污染
可能成為致命威脅！ 
您知道嗎？室內空氣中的污染物濃度，常常遠高於室外 ‼️
根據世界衛生組織（WHO）的說法，室內空氣污染是一件非常真實和危險的事情。不但衍生出潛在的危險，還會嚴重影響您的生活品質 
Ritello，室內的守護者
室內，不該是隱藏的污染場所。Ritello 堅守與大自然相似的原則，用最堅固的元素——水，捕捉每一絲灰塵、過敏源和污染物。清新的水洗循環，讓您的家重新呼吸 健康新風將至，從室內開始
Ritello 水濾式空氣清淨系統，為您的家增添一抹純凈。保護每個呼吸，讓您的家充滿健康，走向更美好的明天
info.en:
The invisible enemy of the home - indoor air pollution
Can become a mortal threat! 
Did you know? The concentration of pollutants in indoor air is often much higher than that in outdoor air !️
According to the World Health Organization (WHO), indoor air pollution is a very real and dangerous thing. Not only are there potential dangers, but they can also seriously affect your quality of life 
Ritello, the guardian of the interior
Indoors should not be hidden polluted places. Ritello adheres to principles similar to nature, using the strongest element – water – to capture every trace of dust, allergens and pollutants. Fresh wash cycles to re-breathe your home 
Healthy fresh air is coming, starting indoors
Ritello Water Filter Air Purifier adds a touch of purity to your home. Protect every breath and fill your home with health towards a better tomorrow

info.tc: 寬譜醫學科技創立於1990年，是首家通過GMP認證、取得遠紅外線醫療器材許可證的公司，其研發、製造的寬譜遠紅外線治療儀，已是遠紅外線醫療保健領域之領導品牌，全球超過20國、共超過2000家醫療院所採用。 寬譜遠紅外線治療儀廣泛用於各項居家理療保健，深獲民眾信賴；並受到醫療專業人士的肯定，是各大醫院、診所必備的醫療設備，在心血管外科、整型外科、血液透析、復健、中醫及各類病房均有運用。寬譜更與國內、外多家醫學研究單位合作，完成多項遠紅外線療法研究，發表於國際權威醫學期刊的研究論文迄今超過70篇。
info.en: Founded in 1990, WS Far IR Medical Technology Co., Ltd. has been the pioneer in FIR industry. We proudly present Firapy (Far-Infrared Therapy Unit), our innovative and multinational patented product worldwide. Firapy is commonly used in Taiwan for treatment in various clinical divisions as well as homecare. We received 510(k) and CE certification early in the yeas. We will strive to improve our products and conduct both domestic and foreign clinical research.

org.tc: 桂冠實業股份有限公司

info.tc:
桂冠營養研究室2023年展出的項目有:
一、	膳食臨床實驗，與國立陽明交通大學產學合作，針對臺灣50-75歲肌少症風險族群進行實驗。探討應用桂冠健力湯於日常膳食，藉以增加蛋白質攝取量，之於體組成、體能改變的關聯性。與花蓮慈濟醫院合作，也針對蔬食族群進行相似的實驗。不同飲食習慣受試者之實驗結果，將於展會中完整呈現。
二、	蔬食新品，蔬食為全球飲食趨勢。桂冠秉持科學營養的精神，將蔬食者易缺乏的維生素D、維生素B12與蛋白質等營養素，設計於食品配方之中。在展會上將亮相最新蔬食產品-素小麥胜肽(BCAA)精萃、奶素均質濃湯系列、植物蛋白多穀飲系列等7項新品。提供消費者更多元的飲食搭配、滿足不同的飲食習慣所需的營養補給。
三、	運動營養應用成果， 2023年桂冠舉辦數百人參加之健力運動挑戰賽活動。透過運動結合正確營養觀念宣導，搭配健力餐做為運動餐食，獲取優質蛋白質，幫助消費者建立健康生活習慣。參加者之體組成與生活習慣改變成果，也將於展會中展出。
info.en:
There are 3 highlights will be represented in Medical exhibition 2023. 
1.	Dietary clinical trials which are collaborated with National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University and Hualien Tzu Chi Hospital showed the effect of adequate protein intake on body composition in both non-vegetarian and vegetarian consumers. The results of both studies will be presented at the exhibition. 
2.	Laurel Nutrilab will show seven new plant-based products. These products were designed to provide essential nutrients such as Vit D, Vit B12 and protein that are often deficient in a vegetarian diet. Therefore, each of our product enables customers to achieve their diet goal no matter their diet habit. 
3.	The achievement of the sports event hold in 2023. We cooperated with chain gym to provide participants aerobic exercise lessons, sports nutrition concept and our product, Nutri-kit, which provides adequate protein and dietary fiber. In the results, 95% of the participants had built the habit of healthy eating and exercising. This result will also be displayed in the exhibition.

org.en: Taipei Municipal Gan-Dau Hospital (Managed by Taipei Veterans General Hospital)

info.tc:
雷射針灸是一種低能量的雷射療法（LLLT），是一種類似針灸的治療，更類似於灸療。它使用低強度的能量雷射代替傳統針灸去刺激身體上的穴位進而去緩解疼痛、減輕炎症和促進癒合。這種非侵入性的治療因其易於使用、無痛和副作用小而受到歡迎。有許多的研究已經顯示對多種疾病具療效，包括關節炎、頭痛甚至藥物成癮等。邁入高齡社會，失智人口逐年增加，失智症為神經退化性疾病，造成記憶力及其它神經功能減退，失智無法治癒或逆轉退化，但可以透過早期篩檢檢測結果發現有異狀，及早診斷、及時治療是可以有效減緩失智症退化。關渡醫院自2021年起成立失智共同照護中心提供失智症早期篩檢及失智長輩個別化資源轉介，提供更完整照護。今年度加強宣導防走失措施。透過互動遊戲，增強民眾對於防走失的重要性。
我的健康餐盤衛福部國民健康署推出了〝我的餐盤〞主要強調我們日常飲食應，我的餐盤聰明吃，營養沒煩惱。
info.en: Entering the era of aged society, the population of people with dementia in Taiwan has been increasing year by year. According to statistics, in 2022, there were more than 300,000 people with dementia. Most of them were people living in Beitou, Da'an, Shilin, Wenshan, and Xinyi District. Dementia is a neurodegenerative disease that causes loss of memory and other neurological dysfunctions. It differed from the normal aging. Dementia cannot be cured or reversed. However, it could be found out through early screening. Early diagnosis and treatment could effectively slow down the degeneration of cognition function. We established community-based integrated dementia care center of Taipei Municipal Gandau Hospital since 2021. We provided early screening for dementia and individualized resources for elders with dementia. According to the missing population statics provided by Taipei City Police Department, 116 elderly people got lost in 2022 more than 60 people in 2021. This year, we will strengthen publicity for preventing missing. People would get more attentions of preventing dementia elderly get lost through the interactive games we designed.

info.en: Acer Medical, an Acer subsidiary, focuses on AI and big data analysis, specifically AI medical diagnosis technology to help medical institutions and people with healthcare and disease prevention. We will have expert lectures and interactive areas, and more. We welcome everyone to come and visit!

info.en:
【Santé Premium Silver Perch Essence】
1. Scientific golden ratio makes every drop a rare essence.
1-1. Best source: Only silver perches with traceability are selected to ensure safety. Toxin-free fish with traceability, raised by contracted farmers.
1-2. Cells Alive System technology: Keeping the fish as fresh as freshly-caught.
1-3. Cross-disciplinary cooperation of experts in the industry and academia: 36 formula trials to form a golden ratio.

org.tc: 興友科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
STARBIA701體組成分析儀是應用在生物電阻抗分析(Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis, BIA)上來進行人體測量，利用微量的電流通過人體，再藉由測量身體本身所產生的電阻，利用通過該身體部位產生的電壓信號來推算身體成分的估計值。
STARBIA701分析儀是一臺可將體組成資料整合的系統與方法，其主要目的是透過資料融合或整合技術，將較低精確度的體組成分析儀所得的結果，例如家用機型，手環等穿戴式裝置所得的資料，使用高精確度儀器所得，其中包括DXA或CT檢驗的結果進行調整，並將不同機型所得歷史記錄加以整合，同時使遠端裝置得以顯示且儲存使用者的資料，完整呈現體組成分析結果。
info.en: STARBIA701 body composition analyzer is used in Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis (BIA) to measure the human body, using a small amount of current to pass through the human body, and then by measuring the resistance generated by the body itself, using the voltage generated by the body part signal to deduce an estimate of body composition.

瀚海新酶始终秉承创新，致力突破，坚持从技术源头开始研发，依托自主核心技术，搭建自主可控的关键技术平臺，可快速、高效、规模化地进行产品开发，体外诊断产品线主要产品超过300种，涵盖分子、生化、免疫等领域，生物制药原料产品目前主要有40余种，还在不断开发增加中。
1 IVD 原料酶和底物
2 血糖试纸用酶和底物
3 生物药mRNA药物用酶和底物，质控试剂盒
info.en: Founded in 2015, Hzymes Biotechnology Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise specializing in the research and development, production, application, and technical services of core raw materials for bio-medicine and in vitro diagnostics. R & D and production centers have been set up in Shanghai, Wuhan, Suzhou, Qingdao, and Yichang. Based on the above technology platforms, hundreds of raw materials related to bio-medicine, vaccine production, and in vitro diagnosis have been developed. We also have a pharmaceutical-grade special enzyme production system with a super-large production scale and super-high equipment standards. It has provided products and services to more than 100 domestic manufacturers of bio-pharmaceuticals, vaccine preparations, and in vitro diagnostic reagents. Meanwhile, our products have been exported to 25 overseas countries and regions. The company will continue to expand product fields, enrich product varieties, and make unremitting efforts to build Hzymes into a “world-class supplier of special enzyme products and services”!

org.tc: 新元鋒精密股份有限公司

info.tc:
新元鋒精密股份有限公司(New YF Precision Co.)為一間專精於薄膜及表面處理技術服務的半導體設備代理商，專業客服團隊可因應不同產業需求提供客製化改機服務。
新元鋒精密為Picosun ALD在臺授權代理商，更為Picosun在臺唯一授權Picosun機臺維修或保養之合作廠商。新元鋒精密成功開發TEM樣品處理技術，獲12吋晶圓廠廣泛採用，市占率達九成；Mini LED背光模組方面也獲得國際大廠指定採用，打入供應鏈。並在氮化鎵、砷化鎵和碳化矽等化合物半導體及雷射半導體攻下灘頭堡，並且投入生醫材料、Micro LED及Micro OLED等先進顯示產業的應用開發。
產品：
1. Applied Materials Picosun 原子層沉積鍍膜設備：ALD鍍膜功能從晶片、元件製程、玻璃、元件保護、3D封裝技術、3D構件鍍膜到粉體加工等都有相對應的技術，近年來更運用在醫療器材的薄膜coating，為具生物相容性且能長期侵入特性的膜層。
2. 電漿表面處理設備：電漿處理可用於多種材料表面特性改質，使它們更容易接合、黏合和上漆，通過電漿清潔及活化表面來改善表面的粘附特性。此應用在生醫領域已是成熟技術，例如微流道製程(PDMS與玻璃接合)。
3.  超小體積微流道控制模組：此技術實現微流道閥件微型化，提供了適用於生醫微流道的閥件、控制器及應用系統。目前已能做到內損耗4uL的閥件，對於珍貴的生醫試劑或一次性檢體操作頗具價值。

info.tc:
AWEX - 比利時瓦隆尼亞外貿投資總署
http://www.awextaipei.com/
瓦隆尼亞外貿投資總署（AWEX）負責比利時瓦隆區的對外貿易與吸引外國企業投資。主要任務在於協助瓦隆區的廠商與世界各地的企業或機構建立互惠互利的合作關係。我們也為有意在歐洲設立據點的外商提供免費的專業評估與諮詢、安排實地考察等服務。瓦隆尼亞在生命科學與生技醫療領域上佔有舉足輕重的地位。除了有技術獨步全球的質子治療設備大廠IBA，疫苗研發生產的領導廠商GSK，知名的中樞神經系統和免疫學大藥廠UCB 外，許多由大學或研究機構衍生出來的生技公司紛紛投入新藥研發、再生醫學等新興生醫領域，漸漸形成一個頗具規模的健康生醫產業聚落，在促進人類健康的世界舞臺上扮演著重要的角色 。為鼓勵創新研發，瓦隆尼亞提供一系列獎勵工具，協助公司增強創新潛力，或獲取 Eureka 標籤
info.en:
Awex (Wallonia Export-Investment Agency)
The Wallonia Export-Investment Agency (AWEX) is the institution in charge of the development and management of Wallonia's domestic and international economic relations. AWEX supports Walloon companies regardless of their size , sector, or target market in every step of their international endeavors. This includes exports, technological partnerships, and development abroad. AWEX is also committed to strengthening Wallonia's position as the premier gateway for international investors seeking success in the heart of Europe.
If Wallonia counts a number of well-known names such as GSK, UCB, IBA or Baxter, some smaller innovative companies whose success is multiplying (Bone Therapeutics, Celyad, Univercells, MaSTherCell SA, Belgian Volition,...) have also demonstrated expertise that has rendered the region unmissable for the life sciences sector.
Wallonia offers a series of aids for R&D which aim to help companies reinforce their innovation potential, acquire external knowledge for a project's implementation, conduct a research project, carry out a development project, create a spin-out from technologies mastered by the company but not exploited, protect innovation or even prepare a European intervention application or acquire the Eureka label

Meanwhile, our team is researching the mechanism of anti-proliferation in tumors by repositioning the new indications of FDA-approved drugs which we obtained 505(b)(2) patents already. The results provide advantages of those 505(b)(2) drugs as First-in-class medication in cancer therapy, shortening the development process and saving significant investment. To increase the value and competitiveness of our products, our team is simultaneously developing new antiproliferative drug delivery, such as virus-like nanoparticles and nanoparticles.

info.tc:
”宇心” 12導心電圖系統為醫療級，用於心臟疾病的篩檢儀器。獨特的產品設計可彈性應用在不同醫療場域，延伸至遠距會診、急診、緊急救護、偏鄉醫療，CRO、長照中心與居家照護等。
不同於傳統機型，僅67g的重量輕巧可攜，搭配的專利電極貼片省去複雜導線，讓檢查可在1分鐘完成操作，更簡單、更衛生。透過臨床試驗證明與醫院用高階機種達相同水準，並取得FDA,TFDA與CE。搭配APP與符合HIPAA雲端管理系統，克服過去院內心電圖無法普及的困難，為心臟照護帶來新的可能。
info.en:
The world’s most user-friendly 12-lead ECG system !
The PCA 500 is an entire ECG solution that simplifies and streamlines the 12-lead ECG testing.  It is hospital grade, yet easy to use. 
With seamless integration of state-of-the-art technologies: a super-compact recorder weights only 67g, patented prepositioned electrode strips, user-friendly apps for mobile devices, and HIPAA-compliant cloud, a hospital-quality 12-lead ECG can be completed by anyone, anytime, anywhere. PCA500 provides efficiency, accuracy, consistency, sanitation and better workflow, and makes 12-lead resting ECG testing accessible. It is cleared by the FDA, TFDA, and CE mark , perfect for telemedicine, ER, EMS , CRO, nursing home and remote patient monitoring.

org.tc: 和鑫生技開發股份有限公司

info.tc: 和鑫生技一直以來致力於單能光研發、生產及製造，運用Nanoray單能光技術優勢，有效降低醫學成像的輻射劑量，透過更小的功率需求及更大的拍攝角度，提供人們尤其是兒童更安全、快速及經濟的成像選擇。Revolux是Nanoray以其獨特的穿透式X光射源， 成功的整合了臺灣的數位影像偵測板、成像軟體及機構，完成了國內自製全球唯一的低輻射手部X光機。外觀設計輕巧，擁有安全防護設計，讓使用者在更安全、友好的情境下進行手部影像拍攝。Revolux於2022.5.1日正式通過美國FDA認証，除了針對兒童骨齡成長曲線的診斷外，亦可針對老人、婦女的骨質密度檢測、類風濕性關節疾病早期診斷及手部矯正重建手術之應用。
info.en: NanoRay Biotech Co. has been devoted to researches and developments of patented transmission X-ray technology. By generating a monochromatic spectrum with a specific niche of beam energy contributing to higher image contract, lower energy consumption and decreased absorbing dosage for patients, the transmission X-ray tube is able to provide a much safer, faster and more affordable choice in medical imaging, especially in pediatric field. As the world’s first “Made- in- Taiwan” low energy hand X-ray device, Revolux is comprised of the unique transmission X-Ray tube, digital image sensor, imaging software system and a radiation contained housing. Furthermore, Revolux revels not only an elegant appearance but also a high-level safety and protective design which is intended to provide a high-quality environment for patients taking the image. On May 1st 2022, it was announced that Revolux officially gained approval from USFDA. For future application, NanoRay Biotech Co. aims to provide a better healthcare service in the medical needs of children’s bone age diagnosis, bone density detection for both the elderly men and women, early diagnosis for rheumatoid arthritis, as well as hand bone reconstructive surgery.

info.tc: 康聚醫學科技股份有限公司於2020年正式對外宣布成立，為廣泰金屬工業股份有限公司的獨資子公司。主要生產、研發與銷售醫療級棒線材以及提供醫用導管導引線的OEM生產服務，廠內遵循ISO13485品質系統認證，和臺灣在地GMP醫療器材廠核可，產品品質優良符合國際規範。本次展出金屬線素材、線材半成品以及可應用於周邊血管、泌尿系統與肝膽腸胃科內視鏡手術的導線OEM產品。
info.en: KT Medical Inc. is a newly invested company by Kuang Tai Metal Industrial Co., Ltd., a notable manufacturer of welding and industrial wires for 40 years. KT Medical developed its sophisticated knowledge of welding, wire drawing, and forming from its mother company, Kuang-Tai Metal, and improved it further. With our technological progress, KT Medical integrated the two core technologies from Kuang Tai Group, wire drawing, and wire processing to develop medical devices and parts. We will demonstrate our medical grade wire material, processed semi-product, and OEM guidewire which can be used in peripheral vascular, urology, and endoscope-related surgery in guts occlusion.

org.tc: Invitrocue (Hong Kong) Ltd

info.tc:
WHO ARE WE :
Invitrocue is an innovative life sciences company that supports decision making for the healthcare and pharmaceutical industry using our proprietary 3D cell culture technology.  We were founded in 2012, aimed to commercialize proprietary 3D cell culture technology developed at A*STAR’s Institute of Bioengineering and Nanotechnology in Singapore, Massachusetts Institute of Technology Cambridge, and the Genome Institute of Singapore.  In 2019, we developed and started providing a 3D Patient-Derived Organoids Technology under the trade name of Onco-PDO Test as a result of a partnership with A*STAR´s Genome Institute of Singapore. In 2019, we developed a humanized mice model for preclinical research in partnership with A*STAR’s Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology (IMCB). 
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES WE ARE OFFERING INCLUDE :-
Onco-PDO™ Test 
Preclinical efficacy and safety Assessment
Humanized technologies
OUR OBJECTIVE
To develop predictive in vitro and in vivo models that enable the healthcare and pharmaceutical industry to create better, faster and more affordable disease treatments for a healthier society.

org.tc: 穎西工業股份有限公司

info.tc:
國產三立柱翻身醫療床
1.三立柱馬達設計：控制床體升降、左右/前後傾斜
2.手動坐姿功能：透過電動調節可由臥姿狀態轉成座椅姿態
3.中控腳踏煞車系統：一人即可控制床體移動、轉向、停止
4.腳踏控制器：一鍵控制床體升降、傾斜
5.護士面板：整合全床控制功能及有各別功能鎖定及角度顯示
6.CPR按鍵：一鍵床體功能回歸
info.en:
Domestic Three-column electric roll-over medical bed
1. Three-column motor design: control the bed body up and down, left and right / front and rear tilt
2. Manual sitting position function: through electric adjustment, it can be changed from lying position to seat position
3. Central control foot brake system: one person can control the movement, steering and stop of the bed body
4. Pedal controller: one-button control bed lifting and tilting
5. Nurse panel: Integrate the whole bed control function and have individual function lock and angle display
6. CPR button: one-button bed function return

info.en:
With 10-years experiences, EliteCell aims to providing optimal cell culture solutions for a broad range of cells to support and accelerate the development of cell therapies and regenerative medicines from research to clinic.
EliteCell's cGMP-compliant facility located in Texas, USA.  EliteCell supplies xenogeneic-free serum replacement, serum-free human lymphocytes culture media, primary NK culture kit to the top research and academic institutions as well as biotechnology, cell therapy, and pharmaceutical companies in worldwide.

org.tc: 矽響先創科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
矽響先創 (DBIO) 致力於研發、整合創新的智慧物聯網(AIoT)技術，該技術結合了「人工智慧 (AI)」 與「物聯網 (IoT)」，整合及設計出最先進的智慧物聯網及感測技術的多樣化產品服務 —物聯網穿戴式聽診器 、物聯網感測鞋墊兩項產品，為人們帶來更加便利的生活模式。
創新的整合技術讓使用者能夠獲得最舒適的無感穿戴，再透過靈活應用AI演算法的運算後，使用者將取得實用的健康數據，並且可以協助使用者用來管理自身的健康狀態與趨勢!
info.en: dBio is committed to using the latest technology AIoT and various micro-sensory devices to integrate people's external movement and internal sensory information and provide integrated information after AI analysis. We strive to build wearable and portable products as a platform for telemedicine, preventive medicine, and exercise management. Through our products ''AIoT Wearable Stethoscope'' and '' AIoT Smart Insole'',  we are able to satisfy all health and exercise management needs and provide the most comfortable and senseless device to produce the most practical health data. We aim to protect the health of you and your family anytime and anywhere!

org.tc: 世基生物醫學股份有限公司

info.tc:
世基生醫專注於藥物基因體學，提供個人化的藥物基因檢測，幫助人們找到最佳藥物並避免副作用的發生。
《專利藥物基因檢測試劑》
我們擁有carbamazepine、allopurinol和Warfarin基因檢測的專利。
並開發成醫療器材IVD，擁有多國許可證，銷往中國、美國、歐洲、韓國、東南亞等。
《專業IVD CDMO服務》
我們的製造工廠已通過 ISO 13485 和 QMS 認證。
此外，我們也利用專業經驗提供IVD CDMO服務。
擅長多種技術平臺、彈性的生產量，無需長時間等待。
《LDTs 藥物基因檢測服務》
世基生醫提供常用藥物基因檢測、心血管疾病藥物基因檢測、
氯吡格雷藥物基因檢測和Baktar基因檢測等。
《代理銷售解決方案》
世基生醫代理國際知名科研儀器與試劑，運用專業經驗與知識，提供多樣化整體服務及解决方案。除了產品的銷售，亦提供完善的使用培訓、實驗流程建議與規劃、技術支援服務、生物資訊分析建議、問題解決等整合性的一條龍式服務，讓客戶使用高階技術平臺更安心，有效率的取得研究內涵。代理銷售的科研設備平臺，著重於基因體學與遺傳學領域，整合次世代定序工作流程各個不同階段的高階產品，滿足對應產業應用與轉譯醫療的需求。世基生醫為10x genomics連續兩年金牌代理商，提供單細胞定序與空間轉錄組的解決方案，其他代理品牌還有S2 Genomics自動化組織解離儀、Immudex免疫細胞精準標定、Abiosciences單細胞與空間轉錄組數據分析軟體、以及Varsome全基因組精準註解平臺。
info.en:
PharmiGene Inc. focuses on pharmacogenetics, providing genetic test of personalized medicine to help people finding their optimal medecines and avoiding side effects. 
《Patented PGx detection reagent (IVD)》
We holds patents of carbamazepine, allopurinol and Warfarin gene testing. We developed these tests to IVD and having multinational license, selling to  China, US, Europe, South Korea, SEA.
《IVD CDMO service》
Our manufacturing plant is ISO 13485 and GMP certified. In addition, we also use relevant professional experience to provide IVD CDMO services. We comply with globally consistent standards and flexible production volume without long waiting.  We can be your production partner in Asia.
《LDTs Service-pharmacogenetics test》
PharmiGene provides common medications gene testing, cardiovascular disease drug gene testing, clopidogrel drug gene testing and Baktar gene testing.
《Solutions》
PharmiGENE is the distributor of various world-known biotech equipment and reagents. These products spread across the whole spectrum of NGS experiment workflow, with application in cancer research, neuroscience, immunology, etc.
We provide professional consultations, expertise experiences, and versatile solutions. Our role is to boost the research capability in every research institute, medical center, and university. Contact us to unveil more research potential. 
Distributing brands include 10x genomics, Bionano Genomics, Immudex,  S2 Genomics, and Varsome.

info.tc: 樂迦再生科技股份有限公司為三顧集團之子公司，致力於細胞和基因治療產品的委託開發暨製造服務 (CDMO)，目前可提供製造至少15種以上不同的細胞技術、製程開發與產品製造的服務，如各式細胞層片的開發(軟骨細胞、纖維母細胞、上皮細胞、iPSC衍生心肌細胞層片及各式的衍生細胞層片等)，以及免疫細胞、CAR-T、iPSCs衍生心肌細胞，與持續開發其他衍生細胞的技術平臺等細胞相關產品；且同時也會與母公司三顧提供客戶所需的臨床申請與規畫的CRO服務，給予合作單位所需相對應的服務項目。座落於扶植生醫產業發展並提供研發及試量產等豐富資源的臺灣新竹生物醫藥科技園區，樂迦、三顧、日生與日立 (Hitachi) 集團合作，引進尖端細胞的 GMP 生產場域，包含超過 24 間的細胞操作室，提供先進的生產技術。樂迦提供客戶滿足全球先進再生醫學產品生產及臨床開發服務的需求。
info.en: Locus Cell Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Metatech group company which is a contract development and manufacturing organization (CDMO) that focuses on the manufacturing of cell and gene therapy products, providing at least 15 different cell technologies, manufacture, and development services, such as chondrocyte, fibroblast, epithelial cell, iPSC-derived cell sheets, immune cell, and CAR-T, etc. Locus Cell keeps developing other derived cell technology platforms and other related products. While, Locus Cell with parent company Metatech also supply CRO services such as clinical application, program, and other corresponding services for customers or cooperative company. Located in Hsinchu Biomedical Science Park, Taiwan, where ample resources are available to foster the development of the biomedical industry such as R&D and pilot production, Locus Cell is partnered with Hitachi Group to introduce the state-of-the-art GMP manufacturing facility with more than 24 cleanrooms and advanced technology. Locus Cell aims to render services to fulfill the medical needs of advanced regenerative medicinal products worldwide.

info.tc: 亞果生醫致力於高階醫材的研發與生產，以提供天然膠原蛋白支架於人體，幫助身體不同組織受傷的修復為概念，發展一系列可運用於醫療體系不同領域與科別的產品。亞果生醫運用超臨界二氧化碳流體去細胞技術，對動物組織進行清洗與去細胞，留下天然膠原蛋白支架，非重組膠原蛋白，且無需使用化學交聯劑，即可成為臨床高階醫療器材，可開發運用於骨科、牙科、心血管專科、眼科、外科手術、傷口照護等領域，透過仿生結構去細胞材料，修復受損部位，提供患部較佳的修復環境，且不會引起任何免疫及過敏反應，應為目前市場上最合適的人體組織結構修復產品。
info.en: ACRO Biomedical develops and produces biomaterial medical devices for human tissue engineering and regenerative medicine (TERM). ACRO Biomedical uses its proprietary supercritical CO₂ extraction technology to remove cells, fat and non-collagenous proteins from animal tissues, while keeping the undiminished collagen scaffold as the biomaterial for high-end medical devices in the medical regenerative field of wound care, orthopedics, dentistry, ophthalmology, aesthetic microsurgery, cardiovascular and neural surgery, etc.

org.tc: 嘉碩生醫電子股份有限公司

info.tc: 利用SAW Biosensor的技術，開發了POCT（定點照護檢驗)的“ iProtin” (艾普定監護系統)，它是一種易於操作且具有成本效益的體外診斷醫療器材，僅需滴一滴指尖的全血，即可在5分鐘內是定量測量人體中的生物標誌(Biomarker)，定量結果可為診斷和監測改善健康狀況提供精確的決策，適用於家庭和臨床應用。
info.en: Based on immunoassay and the core technology of Surface Acoustic Waves (SAW). tstbio has developed a simple and robust SAW biosensor platform, “iProtin” of POCT (point of care testing) for home and clinic applications. It is an easily handled and cost-effective device allowing rapid and reliable tests at the point-of-use. Only need one drop of finger-tip whole blood and within 5 minutes, the iProtin system can measure the biomarkers in human body. The quantitative results allow precise decisions for diagnosis and monitoring improving health and wellness.

Rightest ifree CGM—連續血糖監測系統
「Rightest ifree CGM」為臺灣首家 MIT 研發製造，相較於傳統式血糖機需要指尖採血斷點量測，「Rightest ifree CGM」，可24小時全時追蹤長達10天，能有效改善糖化血色素(HbA1c)控制，成為個人健康智能行動助理。
血糖管理監測之精準度擁有國際認證之專利技術，產品全方面從研發至製造打造Ecosystem數位整合系統，具備工業4.0的技術。

Bionime—a total solution provider in glucose monitoring system with 20 years manufacture experience.

Our patient centered ecosystem for diabetes care connects all medical things and the market via IoT technology. We create an ecosystem includes self-monitoring devices (CGM, BGM), remote diabetes management system(DMS), circle of support(Care app), healthcare facilities and online service.  
*We are 100% in-house manufacturer:
Experienced in product development and 
manufacturing. Comprehensive technologies are highly integrated into our manufacturing process.

Self-developed automatic production equipment could attain intelligent production goal.

org.tc: 戴克智慧

info.tc:
隨插即用的AI平臺
與傳統單一目標且體積龐大的設備不同，戴克智慧以常見的移動端平臺，搭配自行研發的"Daikso Box"，達到同一組裝置即可串接不同的醫療設備。並與林口長庚醫院AI核心實驗室合作，取得資料研發核心AI運算元件，在不同醫療領域皆可取得高準確率的預測與分析。
戴克智慧的願景是醫生拿著輕巧的移動端設備，可以連接不同的設備進行AI運算輔助；一般民眾用自己的手機，可以藉由以前檢查的資料進行分析與預測。
info.en:
Plug and play AI platform
Different from the traditional single-purpose and bulky equipment, Daikso uses a common mobile platform and the self-developed "Daikso Box" to connect different medical equipment in series with the same set of devices.
It also cooperates with the Center for Artificial Intelligence in Medicine of Chang Gung Memorial Hospitall to obtain data and develop core AI computing components, which can achieve high-accuracy prediction and analysis in different medical fields.
The vision of Daikso is that doctors hold light and handy mobile devices, which can be connected to different devices for AI computing assistance; general public can use their mobile phones to analyze and predict the data from previous inspections.

org.tc: 臺北醫學大學

info.tc:
臺北醫學大學創立於1960年，歷經60餘年努力耕耘，在不斷的擴展、蛻變創新下，發展至今共有11學院、1通識教育中心，在校學生人數逾6,000名，已培育超過47,000名畢業校友，分佈海內外各醫療機構、學術單位及產業界。本校擁有臺北醫學大學附設醫院、市立萬芳醫院、部立雙和醫院及新國民醫院，2013年整合三院癌症醫療系統成立「臺北癌症中心」；2017年成立「臺北神經醫學中心」以臨床為主軸，發展整合性神經醫學，共有六所優質附屬醫院。
本校秉持「人文關懷、誠信正直、創新卓越、團隊合作、社會服務」之核心價值，近年來致力於教學卓越、研究拔尖、產學績優、接軌國際與服務社會等發展面向，奠定本校以「醫學教育為本，生醫臨床為用，具社會影響力之創新型大學」為定位，以創新轉譯醫學為主軸，致力於厚實基礎研究、整合六附屬醫院臨床資源及推動生技醫療產業為目標。
info.en:
Established in 1960, over the past century, Taipei Medical University underwent the process of continuous expansion, transformation and innovation. Today, TMU has expanded into a world-class university with 11 Colleges and 1 General Education Center, 6000 students per year, 47,000 alumni around Medical Academic Institute, Medical Industry and six affiliated hospitals which are TMU hospital, Wan Fang Hospital, Shuang Ho Hospital, Hsin Kuo Min Hospital, Tapei Cancer Center and Taipei Neuroscience Institute.
Based on the core value of humanistic empathy, honesty and integrity, innovation, teamwork and social service, TMU is dedicated to excellent teaching, outstanding research, industry-academia collaboration, international participation and social service, in order to integrate clinical resource of affiliated hospitals and meet the visions of translation medicine innovation, biomedical industry development, research advancement and positive social influence. 3 main strategies of future development are below.

info.tc: 名峰科技的VIROCRUSH專利技術最初是為解決醫療客戶對產品抗菌抗病毒的需求而投入研究及開發，以幫助減少產品在環境使用上可能造成的細菌及病毒感染，經過數年艱辛的研究開發，於2019年底正式完成製程研發並開始啟動導入量產階段，而後不久則適逢全球新冠肺炎的爆發，名峰期許VIROCRUSH技術能為全球對抗病毒的努力盡一份力!
info.en:
To fulfill the customer’s demand for anti-bacterial and anti-virus products
MING FONG's VIROCRUSH technology was originally invested in research and development to solve customers' needs in medical industry for anti-bacterial and anti-viral products, to help reduce potential bacterial and viral infections that may be caused by the use of the product in the environment. After years of hard research and development, we formally completed the process development by the end of 2019 and go into mass production. We expect that VIROCRUSH technology can contribute to the global fight against the virus under the outbreak of Covid-19.

org.tc: 倍福自動化有限公司

info.tc:
Beckhoff 倍福自動化是自動化技術的創新者，是國際標準的制定者和推動者。公司所生產的工業 PC、I/O 及現場總線元件、驅動技術、TwinCAT自動化軟體，構成一套完整的控制系統，提供開放式自動化系統和解決方案。倍福推出智能輸送系統 XTS & XPlanar，顛覆輸送產業，倍福高性能的自動化產品，將在醫療科技領域樹立嶄新水準。
工業電腦是PC-based 控制技術的硬體核心。Beckhoff為各種應用場合提供合適的工業PC，客製化選配能滿足各種控制需求。
EtherCAT 是由倍福發明的高速即時乙太網解決方案，已獲得全球認可，具有出色的性能和簡單的操作。可以實現高精度的機器和工廠控制，同時顯著提高生產效率。
XTS 磁懸浮輸送系統顛覆輸送革命，環狀路徑上的直線馬達用先進的機電解決方案取代傳統的機械部件，並以軟體為基礎，輕鬆進行功能修改。XTS系統讓每個產品輸送都有連續的物料流。
XPlanar 平面磁懸浮輸送系統，提供零接觸式運動的自由浮動動子，動子具有六自由度，高度靈活的平面傳輸和軌道規劃，適用於醫藥產業。
info.en:
Following the company’s establishment in 1980, Beckhoff pioneered a control principle that has since defined many of the established standards in automation technology such as PC-based control. The core idea is simple – bundling all automation processes on one CPU, with one universal software platform and one control system. The effect: a seamlessly integrated control platform that enables new application opportunities, thanks to the optimized utilization of increasingly powerful, standard hardware. In addition, users enjoy significant efficiency improvements and a competitive edge gained through their partnership with Beckhoff.
The success of the PC-based control philosophy speaks for itself: Today Beckhoff is represented in more than 75 countries. The company provides a product portfolio that covers all areas of PC-based control technology, and can be scaled to answer all engineering requirements from simple to complex: IPC, I/O, motion, automation software as well as control cabinet-free automation.

2. 微射出成型是一種非常專業的藝術形式，是一種模具設計，製造具有聚合物基功能器件的小型精密塑料部件，在生命科學、電子、醫療、光子學、汽車和航空航天領域的需求越來越大 . 注塑成型的微型成型形式，需要構建一個空腔以匹配您想要製作的零件的形狀，有點像製作樂高積木的塑料成型。
info.en:

2. Micro molding is a very specialized art form, which is a kind of tooling design , manufactures small and precision plastic components with polymer-based functional devices, by increasingly demanded in the fields of life science, electronics, medical, photonics, automotive, and aerospace. The tiny-scale molding form of injection molding that entails building a cavity to match the shape of the part you want to make, sort of like the plastic molding that makes Lego bricks.

org.tc: 滙嘉健康
偉喬生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
現今的透析治療方式 (Dialysis)無法有效清除體內的硫酸吲哚酚 (Indoxyl sulfate)，且慢性腎病變患者體內的硫酸吲哚酚濃度與慢性腎病變疾病惡化的速度有關，硫酸吲哚酚可刺激多種細胞產生自由基 (Free radicals)，增加細胞的氧化壓力 (Oxidative stress)，對細胞產生毒性，這個毒性機轉是造成慢性腎病變、疾病惡化及各種嚴重併發症的原因之一。定期檢測血中硫酸吲哚酚的濃度，作為監控疾病發展及早期治療的指標實為重要。
偉喬生醫創立至今，致力研發臨床疾病之檢測試劑，目的是希望降低患者醫療篩檢成本，並且讓醫療機構能夠方便、快速的提供準確的檢測結果，且能讓病患有長期穩定的追蹤平臺，LEADGENE® IS ELISA Kit 是偉喬生醫首款通過 CE IVD認證的體外診斷試劑，未來還會持續開發更多的品項。
1. 全球首款 IS ELISA 臨床篩檢平臺
2. 取得歐盟 CE IVD體外診斷試劑認證
3. 專一性高：不會辨識Indoxyl Sulfate類似物
4. 與LC-MS分析比較：R2 為 0.9565
5. TFDA體外診斷試劑認證申請中
info.en: We are pleased to introduce the LEADGENE® IS ELISA Kit. Leadgene Biomedical, Inc. researches and develops independently and manufactures high-quality products in our ISO 13485 and GMP certified plant. The IS ELISA kit quantitatively detects indoxyl sulfate (IS) level in human serum by competitive ELISA method, and it is a rapid, highly sensitive, low-cost, and user-friendly tool to monitor IS level in vitro diagnostic (IVD). In particular, LEADGENE® IS ELISA Kit is CE Mark approval for IVD applications in the European Economic Area (EEA). We are also applying for the Registration of In Vitro Diagnostic Medical Device in Taiwan. We believe that we will provide the LEADGENE® IS ELISA Kit in Taiwan’s clinical diagnosis in the near future.

en: Center for Genomic Medicine, National Cheng Kung University

org.tc: 國立成功大學基因體醫學中心
org.en: Center for Genomic Medicine, National Cheng Kung University

info.tc:
衛福部LDTS認證之母胎精準醫學分子檢測實驗室】
國立成功大學基因體醫學中心成立至今已超過20年，是臺灣最早的基因體中心之一。團隊以「專業、卓越、精確、創新」為品質目標，致力於開發母胎精準醫學分子檢測項目。目前已開發完成14項相關檢測，不但在2021年全部通過TAF (ISO 17025)認證，更在5月時通過衛生福利部「精準醫療分子檢測實驗室檢測與服務（Laboratory Developed Tests and Services，LDTS）」認證，為臺灣第一家列冊登錄的母胎基因檢測的機構，也是國內學研單位第一個通過LDTS認證的實驗室。
成大基因體醫學中心的所有檢測服務均為自行開發，從收檢、數據分析到出報告均不假他人之手、在地臺灣完成。檢體不會因為跨國運送而影響品質，一站式的檢測亦可以確保檢驗精確性及檢測資訊不外流，保障受試者的個人資訊。我們期許藉著衛福部LDTS列冊的肯定，可以將成大基因體醫學中心開發的優質檢測服務提供給更廣大的民眾。
此外中心積極創新，開發新穎的AI智能輔助判別系統，以應用在大數據基因檢測項目，大幅度提升準確度並加速turn-around 時程。其中「智慧優質胚胎預測系統」(intelligent cOmputing Noble Embryo, icONE)展現了絕佳的預測精準度，已榮獲2021年第18屆「國家新創獎」的智慧醫療與健康科技類新創殊榮。未來將投入臨床人工生殖/試管嬰兒服務，藉著「智慧挑選」、「精準植入」，幫助不孕及嘗試懷孕的夫妻達到一次療程就成功的目的，體現精準醫療以人為本的核心價值。
我們秉持著「您的心肝、我們的寶貝」的信念，每個檢測都以最高標準檢視，並提供完整的遺傳諮詢服務，讓委託檢測的民眾能夠真正信任與安心！成大基因體醫學中心將持續努力，源源不竭的將研發成果轉譯應用於臨床檢測，為國內婦幼精準醫療盡一份心力！
info.en:
TFDA-certified laboratory for maternal-fetal precision medicine
The Center for Genomic Medicine (CGM) at National Cheng Kung University has been established for over 20 years and is one of the first genomic centers in Taiwan. Our team is committed to developing laboratory developed tests for genetic diagnosis and screening of maternal-fetal medicine with the quality objectives of “Profession, Excellence, Accuracy and Innovation”. Currently, we have established 14 genetic tests, and not only have all of them been certified by TAF (ISO 17025) in 2021, but we have also been approved by the Ministry of Health and Welfare as “Laboratory Developed Tests and Services (LDTS)” in May 2021, making us the first registered laboratory for genetic testing of maternal-fetal precision medicine in Taiwan and the first LDTS certified laboratory among domestic research institutions.
All testing services at the our center are developed by ourselves, from sample collection, data analysis to report, all are done locally in Taiwan. Our one-stop testing service also ensures the accuracy of the test and that the test information will not be leaked, thus protecting the personal information of the participants. We hope that with the recognition of LDTS registration by the Ministry of Health and Welfare, we can provide the quality testing services developed by the Center for Genomic Medicine to the general public.
Furthermore, the Center has been actively innovating and developing new AI-assisted identification systems for big data genetic testing programs to significantly improve accuracy and accelerate turn-around time. Among them, the intelligent cOmputing Noble Embryo (icONE) has demonstrated excellent precision in prediction of embryo implantation and has been awarded the 18th National Innovation Award in 2021 in the category of Intelligent Healthcare and Health Technology. In the future, we will devote ourselves to IVF services to help infertile couples and couples trying to conceive to succeed in a single treatment through “intelligent selection” and “precise implantation” , and to realize the core value of precision medicine with a human face.
With the belief of  “Your beloved, our precious”, we perform each test to the highest standard and provide a complete genetic consultation service, giving genuine trust and security to the people who entrust us with their testing. The Center for Genomic Medicine at National Cheng Kung University will continue to make efforts to transfer and apply its research and development results to clinical testing, so as to contribute to the precision medicine for women and children in Taiwan.

info.tc: 近年來精準醫療與新興科技的不斷發展與進步，已經有許多臨床應用落實在常規醫療之中，目前衛福部已將精準檢驗全面納管，需要通過LDTS(實驗室自行研發檢驗技術)認證方可在醫院施行，目前已有許多不同領域的精準檢驗臨床應用已經落實在國內外醫療院所。希望能透過這個平臺呈現已取得LDTS許可的廠商，其商品與服務可以大幅改善1)優於傳統檢驗技術的臨床價值，2)相關檢驗產業的合作生態系，以及3)未來研發的精準檢驗。希望與各國內外領域專家交流如何將現有的精準檢驗新科技進行整合。期能及時提供臨床端更精準且具臨床價值的檢驗資訊，協助醫師診斷，進而改善病人預後。
info.en: With the continuous development and progress of precision medicine and emerging technology, many clinical applications have been implemented in standard medical care. At present, all precision medical technology companies need the Laboratory Developed Tests (LDTs) certification of TFDA to be able to provide service in hospitals in Taiwan. These LDTs medical techniques of various clinical fields already implemented in many hospitals by different companies.  We hope we can present the strength of LDTs companies. how their products and services can greatly improve 1) the clinical value better than traditional techniques, 2) the ecosystem of collaborative industries, and 3) new developing product and business model. We hope that we can exchange experience with all experts of precision medicine in this integrated platform to provide more valuable, accurate, immediate clinical service for physicians to improve patients' prognosis.

info.tc:
DKSH將於精準檢測展區展出三大品牌，包括NanoFCM、Flow Imaging和GVS。
NanoFCM以其先進的納米流式細胞儀技術而聞名，該技術能夠快速而精確地分析微小粒子和細胞。它的高靈敏度和解析能力使其在生物醫學研究和臨床診斷中發揮重要作用。
Flow Imaging是一家提供高解析度影像分析解決方案的公司。他們的設備使用先進的流式成像技術，能夠實時捕捉和分析微小顆粒，並提供豐富的形狀和大小分布信息。Flow Imaging的儀器在粒子分析和品質控制領域具有廣泛的應用。
GVS是一家領先的生物檢測解決方案供應商，提供各種精準檢測產品。他們的技術涵蓋了細胞分析、蛋白質檢測和微生物檢測等領域。GVS的解決方案結合了先進的生物學、化學和工程技術，能夠提供準確、可靠的結果。
歡迎來到我們的攤位，參觀者將有機會深入了解這些品牌的創新產品，以及它們如何改善精準檢測的能力。
info.en:
DKSH is going to present NanoFCM, Flow Imaging, and GVS at 2023 Healthcare Expo.
NanoFCM is renowned for its advanced nanoscale flow cytometry technology. This technology enables rapid and precise analysis of tiny particles and cells. Its high sensitivity and resolution play a vital role in biomedical research and clinical diagnostics.
Flow Imaging is a company that provides high-resolution imaging analysis solutions. Their equipment utilizes advanced flow imaging techniques to capture and analyze tiny particles in real-time, providing rich information on shape and size distribution. Flow Imaging's instruments find extensive applications in particle analysis and quality control.
GVS is a leading provider of biodection solutions, offering a range of precision detection products. Their technology encompasses areas such as cell analysis, protein detection, and microbial detection. GVS solutions combine advanced biology, chemistry, and engineering, delivering accurate and reliable results.
Please come to our booth to know more.

info.tc:
「G CLINIC」醫療品牌起源於日本，日本是全世界細胞治療臨床運用領先的國家，也帶動臺灣的相關再生醫療執行及法規制定。
G-clinic承襲日本細胞治療實證，結合臺灣醫療團隊的豐富臨床經驗，串連東亞醫療連線，搭配最新的醫療智慧科技與全人照護配套，提供客人最完善的醫療品質與健康照護，提供個性化、專注的醫療服務和健康管理，打造精準的客戶醫療體驗，並強調高品質、個人隱私和健康領航的價值。
G CLINIC 打造世界級的個人醫療旅程-5G Advanced Medical Process  
1.營養保健處方簽GOODWILL JOURNEY（客製化營養建議）
2.智慧細胞療程GLOBAL JOURNEY（細胞因子補充、抗發炎調理）
3.專項儀器 輔助療程GENIUS JOURNEY（新興儀器治療）
4.運動處方簽GLAMOUR JOURNEY（運動專業教練訓練方案）
5.東方醫養學配方GENEROUS JOURNEY（東方醫養概論）

org.tc: 中國醫藥大學附設醫院

info.tc:
中國醫藥大學，為教學與研究並重之頂尖大學，並積極與世界一流大學、醫學中心及研究機構合作與交流，更榮獲英國泰晤士「2019亞洲大學排名」臺灣第3名、私校第1。
中國醫藥大學暨醫療體系，目前有中國醫藥大學附設醫院、兒童醫院、北港附設醫院、臺南市市立安南醫院、新竹附設醫院等，從醫學中心到診所共16家體系院所。
為提供更高品質的醫療服務，我們積極發展尖端醫學如幹細胞療法、免疫細胞療法、基因療法，並且積極建構人工智慧醫院，發展人工智慧、精準醫學、3D列印醫療、醫材輔具等，並設立「新竹健康產學園區」及「中國醫藥大學水湳校區」。
我們以「急、重、難症為基礎」、「以企業社會責任為使命」，將以此精神服務全體國民，提供最好的「教學、研究、服務」品質，並且發展卓越的生醫產業，以實現成為「卓越優秀的世界一流的中、西醫學中心」及「全球聞名的高科技生醫園區」之願景。
info.en:
China Medical University Hospital works in close collaboration with the world’s top universities, medical centers, and research institutes. The remarkable accomplishments of China Medical University have been well recognized by the world: ranks 60th in Asia University Rankings 2019, the first among private universities in Taiwan.
  CMU Healthcare System strives for excellence in healthcare. We invest our efforts in developing top-notch medical technologies, such as stem cell therapy, gene therapy, and AI Hospital. Meanwhile, our projects on “Hsinchu International Health Science Park” and the “Shuinan International Health Science Campus” together create an environment for developing cutting edge biomedical research, industry-academia collaboration platforms and startups.
  As frontline in central Taiwan, CMUH continues to build on a strong basis for acute and critical disease healthcare. The faculty are committed to permanent objectives of instruction, research, and medical services. Above all, we also put great emphasis on social responsibility. Moreover, we envision to be an “excellent world-class medical center with the best integration of western and Chinese medical” and “world-renowned high-tech biomedical park.”

org.tc: 聖安生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
1.	SOA101奈米三特異性雙免疫檢查點抗體
•	亞洲領先，唯一靶向癌症細胞上雙免疫檢查點之三特異性抗體。
•	具專一度高之癌症靶點HLA-G及PD-L1/HLA-G雙免疫檢查點抗體，克服癌細胞免疫逃脫，減少抗藥性及提升治療有效性。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。
2.	SOA201 EphA10三特異性T細胞銜接抗體 
•	三特異性抗體靶向雙免疫細胞。
•	EphA10腫瘤抗原在三陰性乳癌高度表現(正常細胞幾乎不表現)，安全性高，解決三陰性乳癌無標靶藥物治療之困境。
•	可活化且增生T cells and NK cells，增加抗癌療效。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。
3.	SOB101工程化外泌體搭載藥物 
•	亞洲領先，唯一具有HLA-G靶點之外泌體抗癌藥。
•	基因工程改質其具備anti-HLAG功能之外泌體，專一結合於腫瘤細胞，有效降低化療藥物用量。
•	可搭載多種藥物。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。
4.	SOB102新穎抗癌外泌體核酸藥物
•	具備HLA-G靶點，有效及安全的將搭載的核酸藥物及化療藥物送到腫瘤處。
•	可穿過腦血屏障，解決多形性膠質母細胞瘤(GBM)具抗藥性之臨床治療困境。
info.en:
SOA101 Nano Tri-specific Dual Immune Checkpoint Antibody
•	The only triple-specific antibody targeting dual immune checkpoints on cancer cells in Asia.
•	Highly specific cancer-targeting PD-L1 & HLA-G dual immune checkpoint antibodies can overcome the tumor heterogeneity, reduce drug resistance, and improve therapeutic effectiveness.
•	The “Next generation” drug for various solid tumors therapy.
SOA201 EphA10 Tri-specific T cell Engager
•	Tri-specific antibody targets dual immune cells.
•	The EphA10 tumor antigen is highly expressed in TNBC (almost negligible expression in normal cells), providing high safety and provides the solution for unmet medical need of TNBC about lacking targeted drug therapy.
•	Enhancing anti-cancer efficacy by T cells and NK cells activation.
•	The “Next generation” drug for various solid tumors therapy.
SOB101 Drug Payloads Engineered Exosomes
•	The only anti-cancer exosome drug targeting HLA-G in Asia.
•	Engineering exosomes with anti-HLA-G bind to tumor cells specifically, effectively reducing the dosage of chemotherapy drugs. 
•	Multiple drug payloads for cancer therapy.
•	The “Next generation” drug for various solid tumors therapy.
SOB102 Novel Anti-Cancer Exosomal Nucleic Acid Drug 
•	Targeting HLA-G, deliver the carried nucleic acid and chemotherapy drugs to the tumor  effectively and safely.
•	Blood-brain barrier (BBB) crossable and solve the clinical treatment dilemma of drug-resistant glioblastoma multiforme (GBM).

精密微量定量泵：精密微量定量泵採用精密陶瓷柱塞，並以步進馬達驅動精密的滾珠絲桿系統，以確保穩定、精準地液體容量，重複精度優於±0.5%。可用於隱形眼鏡微量注膠、玻尿酸、生物試劑、精華液、驗血卡等定量注液用。

info.en:
Precise Micro Volume Metering Pump：Precise micro volume pumps use a stepping motor or servo motor to drive the ceramic plungers for metering: ensure a stable and precise output volume. The output tolerance is maintained within ±0.5%. Suitable for dispensing various liquids with different viscosity, and can be widely used in dispensing contact lenses glue,  medical reagents, and various medical and biochemical.
Nordson EFD:  Nordson EFD products are widely used in medical life science and pharmaceutical. Suitable for biomaterial dispensing.

org.tc: 國立成功大學，精準健康晶片系統與應用技術聯盟
org.en: National Cheng Kung University, Precision Health Chip on System and Application Technology Alliance

info.tc:
貼身守護神-心血管疾病檢測、分析與評估之晶片系統與平臺之目的為開發應用於心律偵測且具長時效智慧穿戴之生醫檢測晶片系統，相較於市面上其他相似系統，能提供更小整合體積與更低耗電量的運作使用，因此能成為一個更為輕便且長久的健康檢測與監控裝置。此晶片系統可透過藍芽與智慧型裝置(如手機)傳輸，完成(1)心電訊號處理、(2)人工智慧分析、(3)人機介面顯示、(4)醫學資訊紀錄。透過手機APP可與醫療雲端聯繫，進行大數據的分析，並可即時顯示健康狀況。本團隊所開發的智慧穿戴式裝置，同時具有輕薄短小(手錶大小模組)、軟體顯示通知(APP)、人工智慧分析(CNN)、雲端疾病辨識(PVC/AF)，於心律發生狀況時提醒使用者、家人、醫院，提供使用者「貼身守護」。
展出品牌:貼身守護神-心血管疾病檢測、分析與評估之晶片系統與平臺之目的為開發應用於心律偵測且具長時效智慧穿戴之生醫檢測晶片系統，相較於市面上其他相似系統，能提供更小整合體積與更低耗電量的運作使用，因此能成為一個更為輕便且長久的健康檢測與監控裝置。此晶片系統可透過藍芽與智慧型裝置(如手機)傳輸，完成(1)心電訊號處理、(2)人工智慧分析、(3)人機介面顯示、(4)醫學資訊紀錄。透過手機APP可與醫療雲端聯繫，進行大數據的分析，並可即時顯示健康狀況。本團隊所開發的智慧穿戴式裝置，同時具有輕薄短小(手錶大小模組)、軟體顯示通知(APP)、人工智慧分析(CNN)、雲端疾病辨識(PVC/AF)，於心律發生狀況時提醒使用者、家人、醫院，提供使用者「貼身守護」。
貼身守護神的核心技術包含(1)低功耗與高解析度晶片設計可提供長時穿戴、(2)穿戴模組製作已通過IEC 60601電性安規認證可獲得安全便利、(3)手機軟體服務與測試已獲軟體確效IEC62304認證可提供健康保障，目前24小時心律偵測器與智慧聽診器已通過IRB申請，在成大醫院進行臨床試驗中。此外，此核心技術已衍生多項產品與獲得商標申請，且透過以學生團隊為核心的新創公司「裕晶醫學科技股份有限公司」，進行產品的醫療安規認證、量產與服務。產品包含醫療事業處: YuGuard:貼心片(24小時心律偵測器)(工廠QMS認證中，已完成120人臨床測試)、YuSound:貼心音(智慧聽診器)(產品外觀ID設計中，已完成20人臨床測試)、YuRine:尿檢譯(無線尿液檢測系統與平臺)(完成產品雛形展示，已完成50人臨床測試);穿戴事業處: YuCloth:貼心衣(智慧心律衣)(樣品完成，可量產)、YuPet:寵心衣 (寵物心律衣) (模組可量產)、YuBelt:貼心帶(運動心律帶) (可量產);教育事業部: TriAnswer:試穿戴(智慧穿戴式物聯網之無線生醫晶片系統開發模組) (已量產)。詳細介紹可參考影片https://youtu.be/jdgV-7rmt5g
info.en: The goal of the Guard Patch is to develop a Cardiovascular Disease Detection, Analysis, and Evaluation System-On-Chip and Platform. With such a wearable platform for wireless bio-signal acquisition, the user can access and monitor his physiological condition anytime and anywhere. Therefore, this wireless bio-signal acquisition system will become the guard patch of the user. The new company “Your Health Technology Co., Ltd (Yutech)” is founded by CBIC members in 2019 to provide market production and service for users. Besides, there are many products to be developed including YuGuard (24-hour ECG monitoring patch)、YuSound (Intelligent medical stethoscope)、YuRine (Portable and wireless urine detection system and platform for prevention of cardiovascular disease)、YuCloth (Smart ECG clothing)、YuPet (I-Pet ECG clothing)、YuBelt (ECG monitoring belt on sports)、TriAnswer (Bio-signal acquisition system and platform). The details have been presented in the video (https://youtu.be/jdgV-7rmt5g ).

org.tc: 味丹生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
展出項目：
1. 醫療級γ-聚麩胺酸鈉(γ-PGA)
2. 含γ-聚麩胺酸鈉的眼部護理產品
1. 醫療級γ-聚麩胺酸鈉(γ-PGA)是一種高度生物相容性生物材料，已經成功通過醫療器材的各種生物相容性測試。2022年10月，味丹生物科技成爲全球首家獲得γ-PGA FDA Master File for Device (Master File)編號的公司，允許γ-PGA安全可靠地用於醫療器材和相關產品的開發。γ-PGA是一種可生物降解的全天然生物聚合物，具有極高的親水保水特性和高的陽離子親和力，非常適合開發醫療器材，如傷口敷料、皮下填充劑、骨醫材、關節潤滑劑和眼科產品。
2. 味丹生物科技進行了各種實驗測試，證明了含γ-PGA的眼部護理產品的替代應用。經過這些測試，已經證實γ-PGA滴眼液可以增強淚液分泌，緩解乾眼症的症狀和減少角膜損傷。這種產品的獨特之處在於它提供長效的保護作用，無需頻繁使用。
info.en:
Exhibition items:
1. Medical grade sodium γ-polyglutamate (γ-PGA)
2. γ-polyglutamate-based eye care product
1. Medical grade sodium γ-polyglutamate (γ-PGA) is a highly biocompatible biomaterial that has successfully passed various biocompatibility tests for medical devices. In October 2022, Vedan Biotech became the world's first company to obtain the US FDA Master File for Device (MAF) number for γ-PGA, allowing safe and reliable use of γ-PGA for the development of medical devices and related products. γ-PGA is a fully biodegradable natural biopolymer with exceptional hydrophilic water retention properties and high affinity for cations, making it highly suitable for developing medical devices such as wound dressings, dermal fillers, bone and joint lubricants, bone medical materials, and ophthalmic devices.
2. Vedan Biotech has conducted various experimental tests to demonstrate the alternative application of γ-PGA-based eye care product. Through these tests, it has been confirmed that γ-PGA-based eye drops can enhance tear secretion, alleviate dry eye symptoms, and reduce corneal damage. This product's uniqueness lies in its long-lasting protective effect without requiring frequent application.

info.tc: 國璽幹細胞應用技術股份有限公司於2011年進駐新竹生醫園區，投入幹細胞應用技術開發及幹細胞製劑，克服目前尚未獲得滿足的醫療需求。透過整合醫藥級幹細胞製劑生產技術平臺與諸多核心技術，我們已開發多項專有製程技術，並且已將四支幹細胞新藥推動進入臨床試驗。為擴大幹細胞製劑量產規模及提升品質穩定度，國璽除了從製造開始就採用模組製程的思維外，於園區內打造【PIC/S GMP幹細胞製劑藥廠】，穩健地走向規模化量產，同時持續拓展細胞治療領域的開發，與強化細胞治療產業鏈上、中、下游的佈局。
info.en: Gwo Xi Stem Cell Company has established the R&D center for cell therapy development since 2011. We are committed to developing stem cell medicines that have the potential to help patients with unmet medical needs. Our production platform fully comply with medical regulations (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) in Taiwan. We have three clinical trials are ongoing in Taiwan, and one clinical trial is ongoing in Vietnam by now. In the future, we will have established the PIC/S GMP grade stem cell preparation factory (15,225 m2 built-out space) in Hsinchu Biomedical Science Park in Taiwan to put stem cell-based medicinal products into practice.

info.tc:
【長照新境界-科技與研究】
本展位以長照新境界-科技與研究為展出主題，展示衛生福利部附屬醫療及社會福利機構管理會主辦之「建構衛政社政整合計畫、預防與延緩衰弱與失能、雲端智慧長者長照服務計畫」以及未來即將執行之「後疫時代醫療照護數位領航再造計畫-建構長照世代研究平臺，提供長者全人整合照護」，展示既往成果與應用和即將展開的數位科技領航時代性照護計畫。
展示成果包括提供營養、保養、修養及安養之全責式日照中心、分析臺灣中老年世代長期研究計畫之成果與應用，以及導入數位科技之長照服務，象徵著我國長照2.0不但在照護對象和服務內容之擴大，也展示我國著意之資訊科技和創新研發相結合之優良典範。

org.tc: 南瓜虛擬科技

info.tc:
妙手VR為應用虛擬實境技術的醫療培訓平臺，藉由 VR 擬真技術模擬臨床環境、處置流程，可作為訓練及考試用途，可安排多種培訓主題以及客製化教案情境，妙手 VR 產品特色為:
1.	即時多人異地學習
2.	客製化教案情境
3.	多種主題訓練課程
4.	一站式系統化管理
妙手 VR 提供多人即時學習模式，讓指導員和學員皆可以透過網路達到遠距參與和學習。從團隊合作、即時控制病患狀況到深度講課，給予學員適當的臨時反應、模擬真實診療情境、訓練臨場決策力，依據學員的需求與教師的教學目的，可以在平臺上選擇適合的課程內容。
透過主題課程和在擬真的環境中無限次的練習，不只為學員提供最佳學習體驗，也透過反覆練習，增加對於看診、照護等流程的熟悉度，並大幅降低醫療培訓成本。於後臺介面管理介面輕鬆建立學員學習資料，包含學員反應記錄、紀錄評分，提升教學品質與效率，提升整體教學品質。
info.en:
妙手 VR  is a medical training platform that utilizes virtual reality (VR) technology. It applies VR simulation tech to recreate clinical environments and procedures, serving as a training and assessment tool. The platform offers various training topics and customizable teaching scenarios. The key features of 妙手 VR include:
1. Real-time remote learning for multiple participants.
2. Customizable teaching scenarios.
3. Diverse training courses covering different topics.
4. Comprehensive and systematic management system.
Through themed courses and unlimited practice in simulated environments, not only does it provide the best learning experience for students, but it also increases their familiarity with processes such as diagnosis and patient care through repeated practice. This significantly reduces healthcare training costs. Instructors can customize diverse teaching topics and easily create student learning profiles, including records of student responses and performance evaluations, through the backend management interface. This improves teaching quality and efficiency, ultimately enhancing overall teaching effectiveness.

org.tc: 恮新國際有限公司

info.tc: “安搏生體外反搏裝置” A/ECP_A1簡稱EECP， 全機臺灣自行研發製造，一體成形，以心電訊號R波為觸發信號，同步控制氣囊在心臟舒張早期，氣囊由遠至近依序加壓，讓下肢血液回流。在心臟收縮期前，氣囊迅速排氣受壓的肢體血管開放，從而減少週邊循環阻力，減輕心臟負荷及減少心肌耗氧量。EECP在臨床試驗證實有效治癒心血管疾病。
info.en:
“AMBERSAN External counter-pulsation device” A/ECP_A1 abbreviation EECP，A whole new version that developed and manufactured in Taiwan. Where ECG R-wave as the trigger signal synchronously controls the cuffs at early diastolic period. The cuff pressurizes orderly from the peripheral vessels to the more central vessels, enabling the blood flow of the lower limb to return. Before the systolic stage, the cuff (include the bladder) deflates rapidly to open up the pressured vessels of the limbs, thus decreasing the peripheral circulation resistance and the load to the heart. thereby reduce heart load and reduce myocardial oxygen consumption.
EECP has been proven effective in curing cardiovascular diseases in clinical trials.

org.tc: 虹映科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
虹映科技本著『定存您的健康存摺、告知您的健康餘額、增加您的健康存款』的核心使命，致力於健康促進與預防醫學服務平臺生態圈的建構。透過有效的運動導引與深度學習AI技術，創立結合社群與健康促進的雲端服務平臺，讓家人、朋友、同事、運動同好對彼此的健康多一分關心，讓人們有更強的持續運動的動力。Realize Health-on-Demand是我們的價值主張，期待每一位JoiiUp的用戶都能擁有更健康快樂的生活。
JoiiSports app以心率為核心，致力於運動五化：數位化、生活化、生態化、個人化、精準化；運動過後運用大數據分析、深度學習AI演算法，app能給予更精準且個人化的運動、飲食營養與生活型態等健康議題建議。累積在JoiiSports app的運動數據，結合虹映科技職場員工健康促進平臺服務(JoiiCare)，將使用者的運動與健康數據系統化呈現，管理者無論是教練、廠護、人資可以看得到持續訓練的運動成果，也很容易衡量健康促進計畫的實質成效。
info.en:
Based on the mission of "deposit your health passbook, inform your health balance, and increase your health deposit", JoiiUp is committed to the construction of an ecosystem of health promotion and preventive medicine service platforms. Through effective exercise guidance and deep learning AI technology, to create a cloud service platform that combines community and health promotion, so that family members, friends, colleagues, and exercise partners can pay more attention to each other's health, so that people have stronger continuous exercise motivation. Realize Health-on-Demand is our value proposition, and we expect every JoiiUp user to have a healthier and happier life.
JoiiSports app focuses on heart rate and is committed to the five dimension of exercises: digitalization, life, ecology, personalization, and precision.   After exercise, the app can give more accurate and personalized results by using big data analysis and deep learning algorithms to provide advice on health issues such as exercise, diet, nutrition, and lifestyle. The exercise data accumulated in JoiiSports app, combined with JoiiCare, a workplace employee health promotion platform service of JoiiUp, systematically presents the user's exercise and health data, and administrators , whether they are coaches, factory nurses, or human resources, can check the data of continuous training as well as  the actual effectiveness of health promotion programs.

org.tc: 瑞愛生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
瑞愛生醫 (Taiwan RedEye Biomedical Inc.)於2017年成立於新竹，2019年進駐新竹科學園區，專注於光學檢測技術，耕耘智慧健康、食品安全、與環境保護產業領域。
瑞愛創業的切入點屬於微量血液感測技術，同時研發更多尿液檢測參數相關的光學技術，例如尿糖、尿蛋白、尿酸、酮體等，不須使用任何化學品。以跨領域整合研發為營運主軸，實驗室走入民生，創造適合居家使用的大健康檢測產品。
info.en:
RedEye Biomedical (Taiwan RedEye Biomedical Inc.) was founded in Hsinchu in 2017 and entered Hsinchu science park in 2019. We focus on optical detection techniques and delve into some fields including Smart health, Food safety, and Environment protection.
The entry point of RedEye’s technology belongs to trace blood sensitivity, and more urine detection parameters related optical techniques, such as urine sugar, urine protein, uric acid, ketone bodies, and so on will be introduced in the future, and develop products that do not require any chemical use. With the members of research and development as the main operating point, cross-domain integration of optics, institutions, electronics, software, and biological, to create home use detection products.
